Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Aberrant Blood Magic
Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.3qqvnC2U8W26yae7]{Bloodline: Aberrant}

Aberrant whispers shield one target's mind or your own, granting a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Accept Echo.name: Efekt: Accept Echo
Effect: Accept Echo.description:
While in this state, you become trained in the weapon you chose and an expert in the skill you chose. Additionally, while you're in this state, the echo can speak and interact with the Material Plane using your body, and you gain a +4 status bonus to all saves against possession effects, as the possessing spirit protects you from other possessions.

This state lasts for 10 minutes, after which the echo disappears completely until the next time you make your daily preparations. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this effect.

At 7. level you become a master of the skill you chose, at 13. level you become an expert with the weapon you chose, and at 15. level you become legendary with the skill you chose.

Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.name: Efekt: Accursed Clay Fist
Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tMsAj0H0B9XZQjtH]{Accursed Clay Fist}

You take a –2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.

Effect: Aldori Parry.name: Efekt: Aldori Parry
Effect: Aldori Parry.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NZgjqVV2HYzLCvvA]{Aldori Parry}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).name: Efekt: Align Armament (Chaotic)
Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Align Armament (Evil).name: Efekt: Align Armament (Evil)
Effect: Align Armament (Evil).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Align Armament (Good).name: Efekt: Align Armament (Good)
Effect: Align Armament (Good).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).name: Efekt: Align Armament (Lawful)
Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Alloy Flesh and Steel.name: Efekt: Alloy Flesh and Steel
Effect: Alloy Flesh and Steel.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkUvfczLFJcsv3Sp]{Alloy Flesh and Steel}

Your body transforms entirely into flexible iron. You gain resistance 10 to physical damage, except adamantine. You're immune to death effects, disease, drained, fatigued, healing, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, vitality, and void; any of those conditions you had when the spell is cast are suspended until the spell ends, then return with their remaining duration when the spell ends.

Your fist Strikes have a 1k10 damage die, and your metal spells deal one additional die of damage (of the same damage die and damage type the spell uses). Your metal Elemental Blasts deal an additional die of damage.

Effect: Anadi Venom.name: Efekt: Anadi Venom
Effect: Anadi Venom.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.8aIe57gXJ94mPpW4]{Anadi Venom}

If the next fangs Strike you make before the end of your turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 1k6 poison damage. On a critical failure, the poison is wasted as normal. At 12. level, this poison damage increases to 2k6.

Effect: Ancestral Influence.name: Efekt: Ancestral Influence
Effect: Ancestral Influence.description:
One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions

Effect: Anchored.name: Efekt: Anchored
Effect: Anchored.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zxlbMEaXglMVsLpQ]{Tunnel Wall}

You become Anchored and gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} your space.

Effect: Angelic Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Angelic Blood Magic
Effect: Angelic Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vhW3glAaEfq2DKrw]{Bloodline: Angelic}

An angelic aura protects you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Animate Net.name: Efekt: Animate Net
Effect: Animate Net.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bi9w4Z9MQY8VWLZF]{Animate Net}

On a success, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} and takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes; on a critical success, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes.

Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.name: Efekt: Aquatic Endemic Herbs
Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.name: Efekt: Arctic Endemic Herb
Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.name: Efekt: Majstrowano Przy Pancerzu (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Majstrowanie}

Ktoś majstrował przy twoim pancerzu! Masz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczoną Gardę} i ponosisz karę –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości. Efekt trwa, dopóki nie użyjesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interakcji} do usunięcia go.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).name: Efekt: Majstrowano Przy Pancerzu (Sukces)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Majstrowanie}

Ktoś majstrował przy twoim pancerzu! Masz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczoną Gardę} i ponosisz karę –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości. Efekt kończy się na początku następnej tury wynalazcy, lub kiedy użyjesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interakcji} do usunięcia go.

Effect: Assisting Shot.name: Efekt: Assisting Shot
Effect: Assisting Shot.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).name: Efekt: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit)
Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you critically hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Augment Senses.name: Efekt: Augment Senses
Effect: Augment Senses.description: Until the start of your next turn, you can't be flanked.

Effect: Aura Junction (Air).name: Efekt: Aura Junction (Air)
Effect: Aura Junction (Air).description: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to land and fly Speed.

Effect: Aura Junction (Fire).name: Efekt: Aura Junction (Fire)
Effect: Aura Junction (Fire).description: Enemies in your kinetic aura gain weakness to fire from your fire impulses. The weakness is equal to half your level (minimum weakness 1).

Effect: Aura Junction (Metal).name: Efekt: Aura Junction (Metal)
Effect: Aura Junction (Metal).description: Creatures with the metal trait take a –1 status penalty to AC.

Effect: Aura Junction (Water).name: Efekt: Aura Junction (Water)
Effect: Aura Junction (Water).description: You gain fire resistance equal to half the kineticist's level.

Effect: Aura Junction (Wood).name: Efekt: Aura Junction (Wood)
Effect: Aura Junction (Wood).description: Any ally that begins its turn in the aura gains 1 temporary Hit Point that lasts until the start of its next turn. This increases to 2 temporary Hit Points if you're 10. level or higher and to 3 temporary Hit Points if you're 15. level or higher.

Effect: Aura of Despair.name: Efekt: Aura of Despair
Effect: Aura of Despair.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wjnfdh6WzN7HbmeE]{Aura Of Despair}

Enemies within 15 of you take a –1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Aura of Faith.name: Efekt: Aura of Faith
Effect: Aura of Faith.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7sFhBYoz5GSBFNbY]{Aura of Faith}

Your first strike against an unholy creature each round deals an additional 1 spirit damage.

Effect: Aura of Life.name: Efekt: Aura of Life
Effect: Aura of Life.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YawVDUc9uzREIAnO]{Aura of Life}

You gain resistance 5 to void energy and a +1 status bonus to saves against necromancy effects.

Effect: Aura of Preservation.name: Efekt: Aura of Preservation
Effect: Aura of Preservation.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura Of Preservation}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

Effect: Aura of Righteousness.name: Efekt: Aura of Righteousness
Effect: Aura of Righteousness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.erCOcFZJPT2O3gwC]{Aura of Righteousness}

You and all allies within 15 feet gain resistance 5 to unholy.

Effect: Avenge in Glory.name: Efekt: Avenge in Glory
Effect: Avenge in Glory.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.gKDRnsBPBdhJB0FI]{Avenge in Glory}

Częstotliwość raz na dzień

Access mountain dwarf ethnicity

Aktywator An ally within 30 feet gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition.

You honor your ally's life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoints based on level
  • Sets a circumstance bonus of +1 to attack and damage rolls

0.label: Azarketi Purification (vs. ongoing saves against poisons already in your body)

Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.name: Efekt: Battle Medicine Immunity
Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Medycyna Bitewna} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Battle Medicine from that person for the duration.

Effect: Benevolent Spirit Deck.name: Efekt: Benevolent Spirit Deck
Effect: Benevolent Spirit Deck.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and resistance depending on your harrow omen.

Effect: Bespell Strikes.name: Efekt: Bespell Strikes
Effect: Bespell Strikes.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Strikes}

The weapon or unarmed attack deals an extra 1k6 force damage and gains the arcane trait if it didn't have it already. If the spell dealt a different type of damage, the Strike deals this type of damage instead.

Effect: Bespell Weapon.name: Efekt: Bespell Weapon
Effect: Bespell Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.den5wwGUjHDXLkpv]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a conjuration or transmution spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k6 damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).name: Efekt: Bespell Weapon (Force)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.den5wwGUjHDXLkpv]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast an abjuration spell or an evocation spell that didn't deal damage.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k6 force damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).name: Efekt: Bespell Weapon (Mental)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.den5wwGUjHDXLkpv]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a divination, enchantment or illusion spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k6 mental damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Void).name: Efekt: Bespell Weapon (Void)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Void).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.den5wwGUjHDXLkpv]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a necromancy spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k6 void damage.

Effect: Blade Ally.name: Efekt: Sprzymierzone Ostrze
Effect: Blade Ally.description:
Twoje uzbrojenie zamieszkuje dusza bitew. Podczas swoich codziennych przygotowań, wybierz jedną broń lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{Owijki Mocarnych Uderzeń}. W twoich rękach, przedmiot ten zyskuje efekty jednej runy właściwości.

Ze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.EtltLdiy9kNfHU0c]{Sprzymierzonego Ostrza}:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Witalizacji}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Duchowego Dotyku}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.P6v2AtJw7AUwaDzf]{Przerażenia}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Powrotu} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.roeYtwlIe65BPMJ1]{Przemiany}

Z @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.h5ksUZlrVGBjq6p4]{Jaśniejącej Duszy Ostrza}:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Płomieni}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Święta} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{Wyklęta}

Z @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jYEMVfrXJLpXS6aC]{Jaśniejącego Mistrza Ostrza}:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{Tańca}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oVrVzML63VFvVfKk]{Witalizacji (Większa)} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]{Wyważenia}

Effect: Blizzard Evasion.name: Efekt: Blizzard Evasion
Effect: Blizzard Evasion.description: You gain resistance 10 to physical damage and weakness 10 to force damage. You gain a fly speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.name: Efekt: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical Failure)
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a critical failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a –4 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).name: Efekt: Bolera's Interrogation (failure)
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a –2 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Bon Mot.name: Efekt: Bon Mot
Effect: Bon Mot.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

Jesteś rozproszony i ponosisz karę statusową –2 do Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli przez 1 minutę.

Możesz zakończyć efekt wcześniej, odpowiadając ripostą na Bon Mot. Może być to zarówno pojedyncza akcja z cechą koncentracji lub odpowiednia akcja umiejętności oddająca twoją ripostę. MG określa jakie akcje umiejętności się kwalifikują, ale muszą one zajmować co najmniej 1 akcję. Na ogół riposta musi używać akcji lingwistycznej opartej na Charyzmie.

Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).name: Efekt: Bon Mot (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

Jesteś rozproszony i ponosisz karę statusową –3 do Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli przez 1 minutę.

Możesz zakończyć efekt wcześniej, odpowiadając ripostą na Bon Mot. Może być to zarówno pojedyncza akcja z cechą koncentracji lub odpowiednia akcja umiejętności oddająca twoją ripostę. MG określa jakie akcje umiejętności się kwalifikują, ale muszą one zajmować co najmniej 1 akcję. Na ogół riposta musi używać akcji lingwistycznej opartej na Charyzmie.

Effect: Bone Spikes.name: Efekt: Bone Spikes
Effect: Bone Spikes.description: You can make bone spike unarmed Strikes, which deal 1k6 piercing damage and have the versatile S and sweep traits.

Effect: Bone Swarm.name: Efekt: Bone Swarm
Effect: Bone Swarm.description:
You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a 2-action activity, you can deal @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage to all creatures sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. You also retain the benefits of skeleton feats that don't require communication or the use of hands.

Effect: Born to the Trees.name: Efekt: Born to the Trees
Effect: Born to the Trees.description: You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed and a +1 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balansowanie} and Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Skok w Dal} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Skok Wzwyż}.

Effect: Brightness Seeker.name: Efekt: Brightness Seeker
Effect: Brightness Seeker.description:
Aktywator You attempt an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw while performing the course of action from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, but you haven't rolled yet.

Efekt You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +2 status bonus if the result of the augury was woe and you proceeded anyway.

Effect: Bristle.name: Efekt: Bristle
Effect: Bristle.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1gAehVvstGY885kJ]{Bristle}

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Specjalne If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Calculate Threats.name: Efekt: Calculate Threats
Effect: Calculate Threats.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Fha8jFmfkOPxAsrZ]{Calculate Threats}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saves until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Cast Down.name: Efekt: Cast Down
Effect: Cast Down.description: You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speed.

Effect: Castigating Weapon.name: Efekt: Castigating Weapon
Effect: Castigating Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tSmd0cxq9wokSCh4]{Castigating Weapon}

Your weapon or unarmed Strikes gain your holy or unholy trait and deal additional spirit damage.

Effect: Cat Nap.name: Efekt: Cat Nap
Effect: Cat Nap.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zvtYsz9jk8tPvlpS]{Cat Nap}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.

Effect: Catfolk Dance.name: Efekt: Catfolk Dance
Effect: Catfolk Dance.description: The target creature gains a –2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves

Effect: Cavalier's Banner.name: Efekt: Cavalier's Banner
Effect: Cavalier's Banner.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{Cavalier's Banner}

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Ceremony of Protection.name: Efekt: Ceremony of Protection
Effect: Ceremony of Protection.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Champion's Resistance.name: Efekt: Odporność Czempiona
Effect: Champion's Resistance.description: Sojusznik zyskuje odporność na wszystkie nadchodzące obrażenia w liczbie równej 2 + twój poziom.

Effect: Change Shape (Werecreature).name: Efekt: Change Shape (Werecreature)
Effect: Change Shape (Werecreature).description: You transform into your hybrid or animal shape. Your equipment transforms with you and continues to provide bonuses, but your animal shape cannot use weapons, shields, or other held items and cannot use manipulate actions. You gain a movement speed, unarmed attacks, and potentially other abilities based on your werecreature type. These unarmed attacks are in the brawling group. You can Dismiss the effect to return to your humanoid shape, and you resume your humanoid shape automatically if you're reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Effect: Channeling Block.name: Efekt: Channeling Block
Effect: Channeling Block.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.75Y1Lk9JE3q1vDA2]{Channeling Block}

Roll 1k8 for each rank of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell, and increase the shield's Hardness by the total for this block.

Effect: Clue In.name: Efekt: Clue In
Effect: Clue In.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Udzelenie Wskazówki}

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).name: Efekt: Clue In (Detective's Readiness)
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Udzelenie Wskazówki} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness}.

Whenever you attempt a saving throw against the subject of a lead, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.name: Efekt: Clue In (Detective's Readiness, Expertise)
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Udzelenie Wskazówki} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{Investigator Expertise}.

Whenever you attempt a saving throw against the subject of a lead, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Clue In (Expertise).name: Efekt: Clue In (Expertise)
Effect: Clue In (Expertise).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Udzelenie Wskazówki} if the investigator has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{Investigator Expertise}.

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Efekt: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Efekt While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Specjalne A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike).name: Efekt: Consume Energy (Augment Strike)
Effect: Consume Energy (Augment Strike).description: Strikes with the chosen weapon or unarmed attack deal an additional 1k6 damage of a type matching the energy you consumed.

Effect: Continuous Flair.name: Efekt: Continuous Flair
Effect: Continuous Flair.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.13QpCrR8a8XULbJa]{Continuous Flair}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to further checks for actions that would grant you panache in combat.

Effect: Control Tower.name: Efekt: Control Tower
Effect: Control Tower.description: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.

0.label: Seeking a Hidden or Undetected Target

Effect: Core Cannon.name: Efekt: Core Cannon
Effect: Core Cannon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zeyrLJr6b7hPdx4w]{Core Cannon}

Your body transforms into a powerful magical cannon.

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.name: Efekt: Corpse-Killer's Defiance
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.name: Efekt: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower Level)
Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Effect: Creeping Ashes.name: Efekt: Creeping Ashes
Effect: Creeping Ashes.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.G4L49aMxHqO2yqxi]{Efekt: Curse of Creeping Ashes}

Moderate Curse

You and creatures in the aura are concealed.

Major Curse

You and all creatures gain weakness to fire equal to half your level.

Effect: Crimson Shroud (AC).name: Efekt: Crimson Shroud (AC)
Effect: Crimson Shroud (AC).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.M2V1vqAziOkWV30B]{Crimson Shroud}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC.

Effect: Current Spell (Air).name: Efekt: Current Spell (Air)
Effect: Current Spell (Air).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the air trait.

This effect has the air trait.

Effect: Current Spell (Water).name: Efekt: Current Spell (Water)
Effect: Current Spell (Water).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the water trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the water trait.

This effect has the water trait.

Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.name: Efekt: Curse of Ancestral Meddling
Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.qvRlih3u7vK3FYUR]{Ancestors}

Curse of Ancestral Meddling

The ancestral spirits you commune with haunt you and meddle with your belongings and actions, either out of a well-intentioned (but ultimately detrimental) attempt to assist you, as punishment for your audacity in circumventing the traditional means of achieving divine power, for their own amusement, or a mixture of the above. Your hair, clothing, and belongings constantly shift and stir, seemingly of their own volition.

Minor Curse

One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. This predominant ancestor guides you to use their preferred type of action. When you try to use one of the types of actions listed for the other ancestors, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:4]. On a failure, you spend the action but gain no effect (though you don't lose the spell if you were Casting a Spell). If your action would take 1 minute or longer, it's long enough that you can overcome the meddling, and you don't need to attempt a flat check.

During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Moderate Curse

The flat check DC to use other actions is 6, and you get the moderate curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor in the list below.

Major Curse (11.)

The flat check DC is 8, and you get the major curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor instead of the moderate curse benefit.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions

Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes.name: Efekt: Curse of Creeping Ashes
Effect: Curse of Creeping Ashes.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tzDW9l4lBwXCVYtz]{Ash}

Curse of Creeping Ashes

Your body is slowly being consumed by the fires of your internal power, purifying you with each passing day. You are occasionally wracked with dry, wheezing coughs, and wherever you go you leave behind a fine trace of ash that falls from your body.

Minor Curse

The smoldering furnace of power within you begins to feed on your body and generate ash, which you inhale with every breath and leave behind with every step, impeding your footing. You take a –1 penalty on Constitution-based checks, such as Fortitude saves, and your Speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Moderate Curse

The ash you produce intensifies and fills the area around you, obscuring details and making the ground challenging to navigate. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}. An aura of ash surrounds you in a 10-foot emanation. You and creatures in the aura are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}. If you do not move for 1 round, heaps of ashes settle in the aura, creating difficult terrain that lasts until you move (when the ashes blow away).

Major Curse (11.)

You and nearby creatures collapse into ash with the slightest flame. Within your moderate curse's aura, you and all creatures gain weakness to fire equal to half your level. If a creature other than you in this aura is killed by fire damage, its body collapses into ash. Objects and structures in your aura halve their Hardness, and any parts of the object or structures in your aura that are reduced to 0 Hit Points collapse into ash.

Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.name: Efekt: Curse of Engulfing Flames
Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.GTSvbFb36InvuH0w]{Flames}

Curse of Engulfing Flames

You see flames and smoke wherever you look. These flames might be imagined, or they might be a preternatural glimpse of the metaphorical fires that empower the entire multiverse-but you always see them. Fires flare noticeably (though not dangerously) in your presence, you occasionally smoke slightly, and your body is almost painfully hot to the touch.

Minor Curse

The smoke, heat, and crackling flames of your curse fill your vision and all your other senses.

Creatures further than 30 feet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you. You can't benefit from effects that would allow you to ignore or mitigate this concealment, as normal for effects of an oracular curse.

Moderate Curse

Smoke and flickering visions of flame fill your senses more completely, and harmless flickers of obscuring flames also fill your space.

You are concealed from other creatures, though as the other creatures aren't cursed themselves, they can benefit from effects that would allow them to ignore or mitigate the concealed condition, as normal. All other creatures and objects are concealed from you regardless of distance; however, when casting a fire spell, you automatically succeed at the flat check for this concealed condition for targets within 30 feet.

All your senses become imprecise beyond 30 feet, meaning everything past 30 feet that you'd normally be able to see is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} from you.

Major Curse (11.)

The flames surrounding you are no longer simply visions.

An aura of fire surrounds you in a 10-foot emanation, dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage (basic Reflex save) to all other creatures in the aura at the end of each of your turns. You lose [[/r 1d6]] Hit Points at the end of your turn each round, with no save; if you have a weakness to fire, increase the number of HP you lose by that weakness.

You can suppress your aura until the start of your next turn by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to diminish the flames, causing neither you nor anyone in the aura to take damage. While Refocusing to reduce your curse, you are continually diminishing the flames, so you don't lose HP. The flames subside if you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, but they resume when you wake up unless you rested for long enough to reset your curse. As usual for oracular curses, you can't mitigate or reduce the lost Hit Points in any way, though you can still heal the lost HP normally after the fact.

Effect: Curse of Living Death.name: Efekt: Curse of Living Death
Effect: Curse of Living Death.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.IaxmCkdsPlA52spu]{Bones}

Curse of Living Death

Your body is slowly decaying even though you are alive, and using your powers furthers this unnatural living death. You carry a touch of the grave about you, manifesting as bloodless pallor, a faint smell of earth, or deathly cold skin.

Minor Curse

Bones protrude through your skin and your flesh rots, combining with a stench of decay and an unearthly chill. Non-magical effects that would restore your Hit Points only grant you half as many HP as normal.

Moderate Curse

Your dead flesh continues to rot, affecting your health. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and this drained condition is cumulative with any other drained conditions you gain. This drained condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the drained condition reduce your drained condition to drained 1 instead.

In addition, you gain resistance to poison equal to half your level. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against diseases, poisons, and death effects, and if you roll a success on such a save, you get a critical success instead.

Major Curse (11.)

You stand just steps from the grave. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}. This wounded condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the wounded condition reduce your wounded condition to wounded 1 instead.

When you would attempt a recovery check, you can choose to get an automatic success instead of rolling, and if you roll a critical failure on a save against a disease, poison, or death effect, you get a failure instead.

Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.name: Efekt: Curse of Outpouring Life
Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.o1gGG36wpn9mxeop]{Life}

Curse of Outpouring Life

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

Minor Curse

As your life force seeps outward, it becomes more difficult to keep your body functioning. Effects that restore Hit Points to you take a status penalty equal to half your level (minimum 1) to the number of HP you recover.

Moderate Curse

The flow of life energy away from you can't be reversed.

In addition to the effects of your minor curse, you can't be healed by magical effects originating from other creatures. However, if you are unconscious, magical effects can restore you to 1 HP (but no higher). You are affected normally by healing elixirs, potions, and other items.

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} and all your targets are living creatures, you roll k12s instead of k8s for the amount of healing.

Whenever you finish casting a non-cantrip spell, you restore Hit Points equal to the spell rank to your choice of either one target of the spell or the creature nearest to you. You can't heal yourself in this way. This healing has the healing, necromancy, and vitality traits, as well as the tradition trait of the spell.

Major Curse (11.)

Life energy tears through you to empower your magic. Some of your spells carry vitality energy with them.

Each time you use a spell slot to cast a 5. kręgu or higher spell that takes 2 or more actions to cast, you disperse vitality energy in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] with the effects of a 3-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell with a level 4 lower than that of the spell you cast. This healing occurs immediately after you finish Casting the Spell. You don't benefit from this healing. Instead, you lose double the number of Hit Points rolled for the heal spell.

Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.name: Efekt: Curse of Torrential Knowledge
Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tZBb3Kh4nJcNoUFI]{Lore}

Curse of Torrential Knowledge

You have a link to true divine knowledge, but your mortal mind struggles to process and act on what you know. Loose materials around you, such as dust, grains of rice, and droplets of water, slowly shift to form strange runes or faint indecipherable writing, and you sometimes speak unintelligible truths or statements in unknown languages without realizing it.

Minor Curse

You take a –4 penalty to initiative, as trying to process a surge of information about what's happening around you slows your ability to respond to it.

Moderate Curse

The flow of information through your mind grows. The attention you divert to process this huge influx of information means you are always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda}.

At the start of each of your turns, you automatically make one check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Pozyskanie Wiedzy} as a free action. This uses a skill of your choice that has the Recall Knowledge action, using a result equal to 10 + your proficiency bonus in that skill (with no other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

Major Curse (11.)

The massive flow of information clouding your mind overwhelms your ability to communicate with others. You can understand all languages, but you can't speak, use linguistic effects, or otherwise communicate with your allies.

If you Cast a Spell with a verbal component, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] or the spell is lost.

You gain a +4 status bonus on saving throws against linguistic effects.

Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments.name: Efekt: Curse of Turbulent Moments
Effect: Curse of Turbulent Moments.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.EslxR2sbDK9XJaAl]{Time}

Curse of Turbulent Moments

Time passes differently for you than everyone else. You experience fluxes that might manifest as minor day-to-day changes in your apparent age, such as a gray lock of hair or a disappearing wrinkle, or as occasional ghostly temporal afterimages that slightly trail your movement.

Minor Curse

As you draw upon your mystery, time's passage becomes more disjointed, aging, regressing, or warping you out of sync. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}. In addition, you take a –2 penalty to saving throws against effects that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}.

Moderate Curse

Time distorts further, increasing your muscular atrophy, age regression, or warping while making effects pass you by at an increased rate. The value of your enfeebled condition increases to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and the penalty from your minor curse increases to –3. Your status bonus to AC against attacks made against you from reactions or free actions while you're moving increases to +2. In addition, spells affecting you last less time; their duration is reduced by half, to a minimum of 1 round. This doesn't reduce the spell's duration for other targets affected by the same spell. Finally, all non-permanent conditions affecting you that have a duration measured in rounds, minutes, or hours have their duration reduced by half, to a minimum of 1 round. Any afflictions (such as poisons, diseases, and curses) affecting you have their maximum duration, onset time, and time for each stage reduced by half. Spells, conditions, and afflictions that last "until your next daily preparations" last for 12 hours or until your next daily preparations, whichever comes first. This doesn't change the duration you're temporarily immune, the rate at which you can use abilities that have a frequency, or any other features based on the passage of time.

Major Curse (11.)

You become so out of sync with time that it's hard for you to act, but when you do act, you do so with incredible speed. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, the value of your enfeebled condition increases to 3, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to –4. Time passes so much faster for you that your steps appear as a blur of motion to others. You gain a +4 status bonus to initiative rolls. Whenever you move, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while you're moving and until the start of your next turn. As normal for concealment where your location is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się}. Your status bonus to AC against attacks made against you from reactions or free actions while you're moving increases to +4.

Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.name: Efekt: Curse of the Hero's Burden
Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.gjOGOR30Czpnx3tM]{Battle}

Curse of the Hero's Burden

You thrive while adrenaline flows and your life depends on your might alone, but holding the collective battle prowess of the ages within you leaves your body weakened after a fight. You smell faintly of steel and blood no matter how you try to remove or mask the scent, you appear more muscular than you actually are, and you hear the faint clash and clamor of battle in the distance at all times.

Minor Curse

Your body languishes when you aren't bringing harm to your foes. You take a –2 status penalty to AC and saving throws, but each time you make a Strike, you can suspend these penalties until the start of your next turn.

Moderate Curse

The strain of conflict wears upon your body, even though you gain vitality from it. Making a Strike reduces the penalty from your minor curse to –1 rather than suspending it entirely. You gain a +2 status bonus to weapon and unarmed damage rolls. You also gain fast healing equal to half your level while in a non-trivial combat encounter.

Major Curse (11.)

Your body proves capable of truly heroic feats, but doing so interferes with your mental focus. Your moderate curse's fast healing is equal to your level, and its damage bonus is +6. You gain a +1 status bonus to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, but you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.name: Efekt: Curse of the Perpetual Storm
Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.W9cF7wZztLDb1WGY]{Tempest}

Curse of the Perpetual Storm

You are the center of your own tiny tempest, ever surrounded by wind and rain that worsens the more you tap into your elemental powers. Even when you are calm and at rest, your hair and clothing are blown about by gentle winds, you are slightly damp, and your touch often comes with a static shock.

Minor Curse

An aura of a whirling storm whips up in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around you and in your space. The aura puts out small non-magical fires 1 round after they're lit or brought into your aura.

Electrical energy builds up within your storm, turning you into a lightning rod; you gain weakness 2 to electricity, and electricity spells or effects that have additional effects for a creature wearing or holding metal treat you as though you were wearing metal.

Moderate Curse

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] and carries rain on the winds. The whirling winds impose a –2 circumstance penalty on ranged attack rolls using physical ammunition that target you or originate from you.

Your weakness to electricity increases to 5 or half your level, whichever is greater, but torrential rain grants you an equal amount of fire resistance.

Major Curse (11.)

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] and grows stronger. High winds blowing outward in the aura impede creatures' progress. The aura is difficult terrain for Large and smaller creatures on the ground, and for Huge or smaller flying creatures. You aren't affected by this difficult terrain.

The electricity arcing through you becomes dangerous. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[1d6[electricity]] damage. As normal, this doesn't affect creatures you touch.

Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.name: Efekt: Curse of the Sky's Call
Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RI2EMRBBPNSoTJXu]{Cosmos}

Curse of the Sky's Call

You have your head in the clouds-and not just figuratively. Your body is drawn toward the heavens, making you lighter and less substantial than you should be. Your eyes glow with starry light, and your hair and clothing float and drift around you.

Minor Curse

Your unnatural lightness makes it hard to keep your footing and interact with other physical objects. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and take a –2 penalty to saves and DCs against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and other forms of forced movement.

Moderate Curse

Your body is drawn further skyward. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to –3.

You are treated as one size smaller for wind effects. You gain a +2 status bonus against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} attempts, you only take half as much damage from falls, and you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HJYQlmGTdtyGWr6a]{Powerful Leap} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Szybki Skok} skill feats. You weigh only half as much, and your Bulk, should someone need to carry you, is also half as much.

Major Curse (11.)

As your body rises, you float just above the ground beneath you. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to –4.

You can walk on liquids as if they were solid; you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TVFfTP9fHRidwBlW]{Cloud Jump} skill feat; and you don't leave tracks, trigger weight-sensitive pressure plates, or otherwise connect with the ground below you.

Effect: Cut from the Air.name: Efekt: Cut from the Air
Effect: Cut from the Air.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6xBu4BewIkOIt9M0]{Cut From The Air}.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Cyclonic Ascent.name: Efekt: Cyclonic Ascent
Effect: Cyclonic Ascent.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u9ZuPuXj0xA4dHxr]{Cyclonic Ascent}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed or 30 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Daydream Trance.name: Efekt: Daydream Trance
Effect: Daydream Trance.description: You take a –1 penalty to Perception checks and initiative rolls and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects. If you're legendary in Occultism, the bonus against mental effects increases to +3.

Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.name: Efekt: Deadly Poison Weapon
Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp]{Deadly Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Debilitating Strike.name: Efekt: Debilitating Strike
Effect: Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).name: Efekt: Decry Thief (Critical Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a –10 foot status penalty to Speed and a –4 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Decry Thief (Success).name: Efekt: Decry Thief (Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a –5 foot status penalty to Speed and a –2 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Deep Freeze.name: Efekt: Deep Freeze
Effect: Deep Freeze.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jNzjecRGyyAqkkrm]{Deep Freeze}.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target takes half damage and takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Porażka The target takes full damage and takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round, and takes a –15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Defensive Instincts.name: Efekt: Defensive Instincts
Effect: Defensive Instincts.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RxA1PdgGbijkieJD]{Defensive Instincts}

Wymagania you are adjacent to at least two enemies

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.

Effect: Defensive Recovery.name: Efekt: Defensive Recovery
Effect: Defensive Recovery.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]{Defensive Recovery}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

Effect: Deity's Protection.name: Efekt: Deity's Protection
Effect: Deity's Protection.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DUb1VWSbTjdsbAkQ]{Deity's Protection}

You gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Demonic Blood Magic
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.w5koctOVrEcpxTIq]{Bloodline: Demonic}

Either a target takes a –1 status penalty to AC for 1 round, or you gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).name: Efekt: Demonic Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).description: The corruption of sin weakens a target's defenses. A target takes a –1 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.name: Efekt: Desert Endemic Herbs
Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Deteriorated.name: Efekt: Deteriorated
Effect: Deteriorated.description:
Associated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZR5Buon23cDQ1ryB]{Zombie Dedication}.

While your body is deteriorated, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. You can spend 10 minutes checking and repairing your joints and other weak parts of your body to recover from deterioration. You can perform these repairs as part of your daily preparations. Because it's a natural result of your body's functions, you can't remove the slowed condition from deterioration through any other means.

Effect: Devise a Stratagem.name: Efekt: Obmyślenie Strategii
Effect: Devise a Stratagem.description:
You assess a foe's weaknesses in combat and use them to formulate a plan of attack against your enemy. Choose a creature you can see, and roll a k20. If you Strike the chosen creature later this round, you must use the result of the roll you made to Devise a Stratagem for your Strike's attack roll instead of rolling. You make this substitution only for the first Strike you make against the creature this round, not any subsequent attacks.

When you make this substitution, you can also add your Intelligence modifier to your attack roll instead of your Strength or Dexterity modifier, provided your Strike uses an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, a ranged weapon (which must be agile or finesse if it's a melee weapon with the thrown trait) or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TLQErnOpM9Luy7rL]{Pałka}.

If you're aware that the creature you choose is the subject of a lead you're pursuing, you can use this ability as a free action.

Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance.name: Efekt: Devrin's Cunning Stance
Effect: Devrin's Cunning Stance.description: You have a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you Strike an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.

Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).name: Efekt: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.o39zQMIdERWtmBSB]{Bloodline: Diabolic}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

Effect: Didactic Strike.name: Efekt: Didactic Strike
Effect: Didactic Strike.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9]{Didactic Strike}.

Your first attack against the designated target before the investigator's next turn deals an extra 2k6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

Effect: Discordant Voice.name: Efekt: Discordant Voice
Effect: Discordant Voice.description: Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW]{Discordant Voice}, while you are affected by Inspire Courage.

Effect: Disrupting Strikes.name: Efekt: Disrupting Strikes
Effect: Disrupting Strikes.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Nm8n3urzpDqXni1i]{Disrupting Strikes}

Your weapon and unarmed Strikes gain the effects of a disrupting property rune until the start of your next turn.

If you're 14. level or higher, your Strikes instead gain the effects of a greater disrupting property rune.

Effect: Distracting Feint.name: Efekt: Distracting Feint
Effect: Distracting Feint.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hLYoIjH8gPEVXyWG]{Distracting Feint}

While a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} by your Feint, it also takes a –2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: Efekt: Divine Aegis
Effect: Divine Aegis.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xoIxiRtBVHV27Rvd]{Divine Aegis}

Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects, but you also take a –1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

Effect: Divine Castigation.name: Efekt: Divine Castigation
Effect: Divine Castigation.description:
Imposed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.142QRyK2aPIrJu48]{Divine Castigation}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spells you cast damage fiends as though they were undead.

Effect: Divine Infusion.name: Efekt: Divine Infusion
Effect: Divine Infusion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Divine Infusion}

The target deals additional damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. The damage type is void if you cast harm and vitality if you cast heal.

Effect: Divine Infusion (Harm).name: Efekt: Divine Infusion (Harm)
Effect: Divine Infusion (Harm).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Divine Infusion}

You deal an additional 1k6 void damage with your melee weapons and unarmed attacks. If the harm spell is at least 5. rank, this damage increases to 2k6, and if the harm spell is at least 8. rank, the damage increases to 3k6.

Effect: Divine Infusion (Heal).name: Efekt: Divine Infusion (Heal)
Effect: Divine Infusion (Heal).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Divine Infusion}

You deal 1k6 additional vitality damage with your melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the heal spell is at least 5. rank, this damage increases to 2k6, or 3k6 if the spell is at least 8. rank.

Effect: Divine Rebuttal.name: Efekt: Divine Rebuttal
Effect: Divine Rebuttal.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iLFK11lcw5hViTBS]{Divine Rebuttal}

All your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw (or a +3 circumstance bonus on a critical hit).

Effect: Divine Weapon.name: Efekt: Divine Weapon
Effect: Divine Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k4 spirit damage. If you are holy or unholy, Strikes with the weapon also gain that trait, and the additional damage increases to 2k4 against creatures of the opposing trait.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).name: Efekt: Divine Weapon (Chaotic)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).name: Efekt: Divine Weapon (Evil)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).name: Efekt: Divine Weapon (Good)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).name: Efekt: Divine Weapon (Lawful)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Wings.name: Efekt: Divine Wings
Effect: Divine Wings.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vtCrMziYxNyj8kP7]{Divine Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Draconic Blood Magic
Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ZHabYxSgYK0XbjhM]{Bloodline: Draconic}

Draconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings.name: Efekt: Dragon's Rage Wings
Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bqZkAFS6eq9TKXMO]{Dragon's Rage Wings}

While you are raging, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Efekt: Dread Marshal Stance
Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}

You gain a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon the originator of the aura is wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Duelist's Challenge.name: Efekt: Duelist's Challenge
Effect: Duelist's Challenge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5op3m0gwZjL4udit]{Duelist's Challenge}.

Select one foe that you can see and proclaim a challenge. That foe is your dueling opponent until they are defeated, flee, or the encounter ends.

Any time you hit that enemy using a single one-handed melee weapon while your other hand or hands are free, you gain a circumstance bonus to the Strike's damage equal to the number of damage dice your weapon deals.

If you attack a creature other than your dueling opponent, you take a circumstance penalty to damage equal to the number of damage dice your weapon deals.

Effect: Earth Impulse Junction.name: Efekt: Earth Impulse Junction
Effect: Earth Impulse Junction.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Echoes in Stone.name: Efekt: Echoes in Stone
Effect: Echoes in Stone.description: You gain imprecise tremorsense with a range of 20 feet.

Effect: Educate Allies.name: Efekt: Educate Allies
Effect: Educate Allies.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies}.

All allies affected by your composition spell gain your +1 circumstance bonus from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iX5HEqRImhKzfPR2]{Well-Versed} until the start of your next turn. Your personal circumstance bonus from Well-Versed also increases to +2 until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Educate Allies (Self).name: Efekt: Educate Allies (Self)
Effect: Educate Allies (Self).description: Zapewniany przez using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies} on your allies.

Effect: Elemental Assault.name: Efekt: Elemental Assault
Effect: Elemental Assault.description: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic. Choose one element. Until the end of your next turn, your Strikes deal an additional 1k6 damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, or cold for water.

Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).name: Efekt: Elemental Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RXRnJcG4XSabZ35a]{Bloodline: Elemental}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

Effect: Elementalist Dedication.name: Efekt: Elementalist Dedication
Effect: Elementalist Dedication.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{Elementalist Dedication}

Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice from your elemental philosophy. You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1 resistance) against damage dealt by effects with your attuned elemental trait. This attunement lasts until you next make your daily preparations.

Effect: Emblazon Antimagic.name: Efekt: Emblazon Antimagic
Effect: Emblazon Antimagic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl]{Emblazon Antimagic}

  • Shield When the wielder has the shield raised, they gain the shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against magic.
  • Weapon When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract rank.

Effect: Emblazon Armament.name: Efekt: Emblazon Armament
Effect: Emblazon Armament.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament}

  • Shield The shield gains a +1 status bonus to its Hardness.
  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls with the weapon.

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Shield).name: Efekt: Emblazon Armament (Shield)
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Shield).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament} when applied to a shield.

  • Shield The shield gains a +1 status bonus to its Hardness.

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).name: Efekt: Emblazon Armament (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament}

The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls with the chosen weapon

Effect: Emblazon Energy.name: Efekt: Emblazon Energy
Effect: Emblazon Energy.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy}

  • Shield Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The wielder gains the shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against that damage type.
  • Weapon Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The weapon deals an extra 1k4 damage of that type. Increase this extra damage to 1k6 if you have a domain spell with a trait matching that type.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).name: Efekt: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1k4 acid damage, or an extra 1k6 acid damage if you have a domain spell with the acid trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).name: Efekt: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1k4 cold damage, or an extra 1k6 cold damage if you have a domain spell with the cold trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.name: Efekt: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electricity)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1k4 electricity damage, or an extra 1k6 electricity damage if you have a domain spell with the electricity trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).name: Efekt: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1k4 fire damage, or an extra 1k6 fire damage if you have a domain spell with the fire trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).name: Efekt: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1k4 sonic damage, or an extra 1k6 sonic damage if you have a domain spell with the sonic trait.

Effect: Emotional Surge.name: Efekt: Emotional Surge
Effect: Emotional Surge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8DI7wLxtUy99g9K]{Emotional Surge}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

Effect: Empathetic Plea.name: Efekt: Empathetic Plea
Effect: Empathetic Plea.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MS53Ds75BT379ZFm]{Empathetic Plea}

The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to damage on the triggering Strike and all its Strikes against you until the beginning of its next turn. The penalty is –4 if you're an expert in Diplomacy, –6 if you're a master, and –8 if you're legendary.

Effect: Encroaching Presence.name: Efekt: Encroaching Presence
Effect: Encroaching Presence.description:
Seeing and touching the beyond leaves you open to its alien influence, warping your perceptions and thoughts.

Mild Backlash Something inexplicable touches your mind, leaving you with lingering horror. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Moderate Backlash Disorienting visions and figments cover your vision, as if you're seeing through another set of alien senses. For 10 minutes, all creatures become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you as they are covered in visual distortions only you can see.

Severe Backlash Your life force is siphoned away as the presence tugs your soul to wherever it resides. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until your next daily preparations.

Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.name: Efekt: Enduring Debilitating Strike
Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike} if the rogue also has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzfWrOqHL2GcK0rr]{Enduring Debilitation}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Energetic Meltdown.name: Efekt: Energetic Meltdown
Effect: Energetic Meltdown.description:
As you channel energy through your deviant abilities, some of it turns back on you, spiking your body temperature or dancing across your skin.

Mild Backlash You take [[/r @actor.level]]{damage equal to your level} as energy scours your body.

Moderate Backlash Energy wracks your body. After taking the damage, you gain weakness to the energy type of your backlash until your next daily preparations. The weakness is equal to one-third of your level. You also lose immunity to the energy type if you had it, until your next daily preparations.

Severe Backlash Whatever furnace or well within you that provides the energy for your deviation overloads completely, cascading out of you in an uncontrolled burst. You deal [[/r (@actor.level)d6]]{1k6 damage per level} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save. You automatically take full damage without attempting a save.

Effect: Energize Wings.name: Efekt: Energize Wings
Effect: Energize Wings.description: You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Effect: Energy Ablation.name: Efekt: Energy Ablation
Effect: Energy Ablation.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iS4Vc2zv7vgL5mnX]{Energy Ablation}

You gain resistance to an energy damage type of your choice equal to the spell's rank.

Effect: Energy Shot.name: Efekt: Energy Shot
Effect: Energy Shot.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TSDbyYRQwhIyY2Oq]{Energy Shot}

On your first three Strikes of this encounter with a firearm or crossbow, you deal an additional 1 acid, cold, fire or electricity damage. You choose which damage type to deal as part of making each Strike.

Effect: Enforce Oath.name: Efekt: Enforce Oath
Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YZ138OqflDhrkqmR]{Enforce Oath}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

However, your dedication to Enforcing your Oath draws your focus away from all other foes. While you are Enforcing your Oath, you take a –1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

You stop Enforcing your Oath once the chosen creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points or offers a legitimate surrender to you or your allies. You immediately stop Enforcing your Oath if you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or if the chosen creature goes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{Unnoticed} by you for more than 1 minute. You can also stop Enforcing your Oath at any time during your turn as a free action.

0.label: Target is subject of your Enforce Oath

Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: Efekt: Engine of Destruction
Effect: Engine of Destruction.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GLHh9MWlcINLC6Q0]{Engine of Destruction}

Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: Efekt: Enlightened Presence
Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ]{Enlightened Presence}.

You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Envenom Fangs.name: Efekt: Envenom Fangs
Effect: Envenom Fangs.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IY86Kvopp4ACuQsw]{Envenom Fangs}

You envenom your fangs. If the next fangs Strike you make before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 1k6 poison damage. On a critical failure, the poison is wasted as normal.

Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Wit).name: Efekt: Exemplary Finisher (Wit)
Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Wit).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.KxpaxUSuBC7hr4F7]{Exemplary Finisher}

The foe takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Eye of the Arclords.name: Efekt: Eye of the Arclords
Effect: Eye of the Arclords.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr]{Eye of the Arclords}.

While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits:

  • you gain the effects of the detect magic arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell;
  • you gain darkvision;
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against Hide and Sneak.

1.label: Eye of the Arclords (Seek undetected & hidden creatures)

Effect: Familiar of Balanced Luck.name: Efekt: Familiar of Balanced Luck
