Effect: Familiar of Balanced Luck.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.6ZmgkMHUGGb1mDhr]{Familiar of Balanced Luck}

When you Cast or Sustain a hex, one creature within 15 feet of your familiar gets your choice of either a +1 status bonus to its AC or a –1 status penalty to its AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Familiar of Keen Senses.name: Efekt: Familiar of Keen Senses
Effect: Familiar of Keen Senses.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.onye3PN84lmca11D]{Familiar of Keen Senses}

When you Cast or Sustain a hex, your familiar gains your choice of an imprecise scent, tremorsense, or wavesense, with a range of 60 feet until the start of your next turn, and it can immediately @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.sn2hIy1iIJX9Vpgj]{Point Out} as a free action.

Effect: Familiar of Restored Spirit.name: Efekt: Familiar of Restored Spirit
Effect: Familiar of Restored Spirit.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.ZCze1FY3Rmnvd6Dx]{Familiar of Restored Spirit}

When you Cast or Sustain a hex, one willing creature within 15 feet of your familiar gains temporary Hit Points equal to 2 + half your level, which last until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Favorable Winds.name: Efekt: Favorable Winds
Effect: Favorable Winds.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OK8Fm7EG8wjoYZBX]{Favorable Winds}.

You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Spee.name: Efekt: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Spee.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in forested, mountainous or underground terrain and do not already have a climb Speed.

You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed.name: Efekt: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Aquatic)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in aquatic terrain and do not already have a swim Speed.

You gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb.name: Efekt: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in forested, mountainous or underground terrain and already have a climb Speed.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your climb Speed.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim S.name: Efekt: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim S.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Aquatic)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in aquatic terrain and already have a swimSpeed.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your swim Speed.

Effect: Fey Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Fey Blood Magic
Effect: Fey Blood Magic.description: Colorful fey glamours dance around you or one target, causing them to be concealed for 1 round. Such obvious concealment can't be used to Hide.

Effect: Fiendish Wings.name: Efekt: Fiendish Wings
Effect: Fiendish Wings.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Fleet Tempo.name: Efekt: Fleet Tempo
Effect: Fleet Tempo.description: You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Forcible Energy.name: Efekt: Forcible Energy
Effect: Forcible Energy.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UJafwv306v75Syy7]{Forcible Energy}

The target gains weakness 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage.

Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.name: Efekt: Forest Endemic Herbs
Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.

Effect: Formation Training.name: Efekt: Formation Training
Effect: Formation Training.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aoz9dCq2NynyUYEf]{Formation Training}

You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

Effect: Fortify Shield.name: Efekt: Fortify Shield
Effect: Fortify Shield.description: Add your level to your shield's Hardness.

Effect: Fresh Produce.name: Efekt: Fresh Produce
Effect: Fresh Produce.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IcAEMf94XoTvtzAO]{Fresh Produce}

You gain resistance to void damage.

Effect: Fulminating Shot.name: Efekt: Fulminating Shot
Effect: Fulminating Shot.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.o3J79hnr00ztcwtT]{Fulminating Shot}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If you hit with your next attack roll using a firearm or crossbow before the end of your turn, you deal 1k6 additional damage of this type. At 12. level, this increases to 2k6 additional damage, and at 18. level, it increases to 3k6 additional damage.

Effect: Fungal Rot.name: Efekt: Fungal Rot
Effect: Fungal Rot.description:
As you use your powers, radioactive molds and fungi consume your flesh, making you look (and feel) like a rotting, walking corpse.

Mild Backlash You take damage equal to your level as your body decays.

Moderate Backlash You take damage equal to your level and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Severe Backlash You take damage equal to twice your level and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 4}. You can't reduce the value of your sickened condition below 1 for 1 hour.

Effect: Furnace Form.name: Efekt: Furnace Form
Effect: Furnace Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6vHkvQv0j56nZuR3]{Furnace Form}

You become living flame, giving you fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water. Your unarmed attacks deal 1k4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). Your fire Elemental Blasts deal an additional die of damage. In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Gathering Moss.name: Efekt: Gathering Moss
Effect: Gathering Moss.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yg02rHaDPpGSgkrk]{Gathering Moss}

You gain fast healing equal to your level.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Genie Blood Magic
Effect: Genie Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tYOMBiH3HbViNWwn]{Bloodline: Genie}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round, or a target takes a –1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).name: Efekt: Genie Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. A target takes a –1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Ghost Strike.name: Efekt: Ghost Strike
Effect: Ghost Strike.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pM0g4ColXTiQ3gTa]{Ghost Strike}

The weapon gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune. At 10. level, you can apply this effect to two weapons instead of one.

Effect: Ghost Wrangler.name: Efekt: Ghost Wrangler
Effect: Ghost Wrangler.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.00OnDt8UEMwfoYWH]{Ghost Wrangler}

Your fists gain the effects of the ghost touch property rune.

Effect: Ghosts in the Storm.name: Efekt: Ghosts in the Storm
Effect: Ghosts in the Storm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.sPIaly8bgNxgcNvT]{Stance: Ghosts in the Storm}

The creature gains a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.

Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Move).name: Efekt: Ghosts in the Storm (Move)
Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Move).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ABL4daQ7c65d0tEM]{Ghosts in the Storm}

The creature is concealed, and its Strikes gain the shock rune.

Effect: Giant's Lunge.name: Efekt: Giant's Lunge
Effect: Giant's Lunge.description: Until your rage ends, all your melee weapons and unarmed attacks gain reach 10.

Effect: Giant's Stature.name: Efekt: Giant's Stature
Effect: Giant's Stature.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.W21jKAcG0GtEtBiK]{Giant's Stature}

You become Large, increasing your reach by 5 feet and gaining the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} condition until you stop raging

Effect: Glimpses to Beyond.name: Efekt: Glimpses to Beyond
Effect: Glimpses to Beyond.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.8CZwqRQ1w8OaAtO7]{(Affinity Ablaze) Biting Roses: Glimpses to Beyond}

You gain spiritsense as a precise sense with a range of 60 feet.

Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).name: Efekt: Goblin Song (Critical Success)
Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a –1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Effect: Goblin Song (Success).name: Efekt: Goblin Song (Success)
Effect: Goblin Song (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a –1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Effect: Great Tengu Form.name: Efekt: Great Tengu Form
Effect: Great Tengu Form.description:
Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}.

This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: Efekt: Guardian's Deflection
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6]{Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j]{Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Guardian's Embrace.name: Efekt: Guardian's Embrace
Effect: Guardian's Embrace.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC against physical attacks and can use a reaction to gain resistance 10 to physical damage dealt by that attack, which ends this effect.

Effect: Guided Skill.name: Efekt: Guided Skill
Effect: Guided Skill.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to checks made using Acrobatics, Occultism, Stealth, or Survival.

Effect: Guided by the Stars.name: Efekt: Guided by the Stars
Effect: Guided by the Stars.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s1swBWSqtfrXTJHK]{Guided by the Stars}

You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Hag Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Hag Blood Magic
Effect: Hag Blood Magic.description: Spiteful curses punish your foes. The first creature that deals damage to you before the end of your next turn takes 2 mental damage per spell rank and must attempt a basic Will save.

Effect: Hamstringing Strike.name: Efekt: Cios Pod Kolana
Effect: Hamstringing Strike.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s2GbcUIXG1ZBurSd]{Cios Pod Kolana}

Jeśli trafisz swoją zwierzynę, istota ta ponosi karę statusową –5 stóp do swojej Prędkości. Jeśli trafisz swoją zwierzynę krytycznie, istota ponosi karę statusową –10 stóp do swojej Prędkości.

Effect: Harden Flesh.name: Efekt: Harden Flesh
Effect: Harden Flesh.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.REgTwIVgI3j1FQiJ]{Harden Flesh}

You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Harrow the Fiend.name: Efekt: Harrow the Fiend
Effect: Harrow the Fiend.description: You gain a +1 status bonus on all Strikes or spell attack rolls against fiends.

Effect: Harrow-Chosen.name: Efekt: Harrow-Chosen
Effect: Harrow-Chosen.description:
This benefit is determined by alignment of the card you draw from the deck. The card can match both alignment components with yours (true match), match a single alignment component with yours (partial match), have no matching alignment components (unmatched), or have a diametrically opposed alignment to yours (misaligned).

True match: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to a saving throw of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) for 1 minute.

Partial match: You gain resistance to one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) equal to your level for 1 minute.

Unmatched: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level. The temporary Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Misaligned: You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to your Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Efekt: Harsh Judgement
Effect: Harsh Judgement.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.37uOb0iaWCfTCvBZ]{Harsh Judgement}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a –1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: Efekt: Heaven's Thunder
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and any monk weapons you wield deal additional electricity and sonic damage; the amount of each damage type is equal to the number of damage dice for the weapon or unarmed attack. Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved (using the number of damage dice of your unarmed attack to determine the damage dealt).

If you also know the ki blast ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead).

Effect: Helpful Tinkering.name: Efekt: Helpful Tinkering
Effect: Helpful Tinkering.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qUSWPWxYF8gfhfHM]{Helpful Tinkering}

For 1 minute, the chosen ally's Strikes with the chosen weapon gain the same offensive boost your innovation has.

Effect: Heroes' Call.name: Efekt: Heroes' Call
Effect: Heroes' Call.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Efekt: Heroic Recovery
Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.name: Efekt: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Boost
Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.description: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Hopeful Athamaru.name: Efekt: Hopeful Athamaru
Effect: Hopeful Athamaru.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: Efekt: Hungry Goblin
Effect: Hungry Goblin.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Efekt: Przewaga Łowcy, Salwa
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Przyznawane kiedy łowca podzieli się z tobą swoją przewagą @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Salwa}.

Przeciw twojej łowionej zwierzynie twoja kara za atak wielokrotny wynosi –3 (–2 dla broni chyżej) przy twoim drugim ataku zamiast –5, oraz –6 (–4 dla broni chyżej) przy twoim trzecim ataku w danej turze zamiast –10.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Efekt: Przewaga Łowcy, Spryt
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Przyznawane kiedy łowca podzieli się z tobą swoją przewagą @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Sprytu}.

Zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną +1 do swojej KP przeciw atakom swojej zwierzyny oraz premię sytuacyjną +2 do testów Oszukiwania, Skradania się i Zastraszania oraz dowolnych testów wykonywanych aby Pozyskać Wiedzę o swojej zwierzynie.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Efekt: Przewaga Łowcy, Precyzja
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Przyznawane kiedy łowca podzieli się z tobą swoją przewagą @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Precyzji}.

Za pierwszym razem kiedy trafisz swoją łowioną zwierzynę w danej rundzie, zadajesz dodatkowo 1k8 obrażeń precyzyjnych. (Obrażenia precyzyjne zwiększają zadawane przez ciebie obrażenia, używając tego samego typu obrażeń, ale są nieskuteczne przeciw istotom, którym brakuje organów witalnych czy słabych punktów.)

Na poziomie 11. dodatkowe obrażenia zwiększają się do 2k8 obrażeń precyzyjnych a na poziomie 19. dodatkowe obrażenia zwiększają się do 3k8 obrażeń precyzyjnych.

3.label: First attack on hunted prey this round

Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).name: Efekt: Postać Hybrydowa (Bestioludź)
Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Zmianę Kształtu}.

W postaci hybrydowej zyskujesz wygląd będący mieszanką cech wynikających z twojego przodkowstwa oraz twojego wrodzonego zwierzęcia. W postaci hybrydowej zyskujesz Ciosy wręcz oraz szczękami odpowiadające cechom twojego wrodzonego zwierzęcia (kły dla nietoperzy, dziób dla orłów, żuwaczki dla os i tak dalej). Twoje szczeki zadają 1k4 obrażeń kłutych, mają cechy chyżość, finezyjność oraz wręcz i należą do grupy broni ręcznych.

Effect: Hydration.name: Efekt: Hydration
Effect: Hydration.description: Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.vt67b8uoNEbskcBv]{Hydration} if you spend 24 hours outside of water.

Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Imperial Blood Magic
Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ZEtJJ5UOlV5oTWWp]{Bloodline: Imperial}

A surge of ancestral memories grants you or one target a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Efekt: Improved Poison Weapon
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Indomitable Spirit.name: Efekt: Indomitable Spirit
Effect: Indomitable Spirit.description: You get a +4 circumstance bonus to AC and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. The additional action can be used to Strike or Stride.

Effect: Inertial Barrier.name: Efekt: Inertial Barrier
Effect: Inertial Barrier.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Nm4yeoJVXRy0Wyth]{Inertial Barrier}

You or one target of the spell gains resistance to physical damage equal to 2 + the spell's rank until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: Efekt: Inspired Stratagem
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description: You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Efekt: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Inspiring Resilience.name: Efekt: Inspiring Resilience
Effect: Inspiring Resilience.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.

Effect: Inventive Offensive.name: Efekt: Inventive Offensive
Effect: Inventive Offensive.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SrSYEHqOLXWuj65e]{Inventive Offensive}

When you use this ability, add one of the following weapon traits to a melee weapon you wield: deadly k6, disarm, nonlethal, shove, trip, versatile B, versatile P, or versatile S. You cannot add a trait that the weapon already has. The weapon retains this trait until you a successfully hit and deal damage with the weapon. The weapon retains this trait only while you wield it, and you can have only one weapon modified in this way at any time.

If you have legendary proficiency in Crafting, you can apply two weapon traits from the list when using this feat.

Effect: Invigorating Breath.name: Efekt: Invigorating Breath
Effect: Invigorating Breath.description: You gain 20 temporary Hit Points. At 15. level, you instead gain 30 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Juvenile Flight.name: Efekt: Juvenile Flight
Effect: Juvenile Flight.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Efekt: Kindle Inner Flames
Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.description: The creature gains a status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.

Effect: Kneecap.name: Efekt: Kneecap
Effect: Kneecap.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1muxLx8Vacn2SLHc]{Kneecap}

The target takes a status penalty to its Speed.

Effect: Known Weakness.name: Efekt: Known Weakness
Effect: Known Weakness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{Known Weaknesses}.

Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Lava Leap.name: Efekt: Lava Leap
Effect: Lava Leap.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Efekt: Legendary Monster Hunter
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Efekt: Legendary Monster Warden
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Efekt: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VU7aZC7L08Mk1GVA]{Esoteric Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Efekt: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.K3QkcNWY8qpNEJrk]{Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Efekt: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uv235v6hXCITAFej]{Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Efekt: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lDfOzhKJoTCkLPtn]{Shining Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Life-Draining.name: Efekt: Life-Draining
Effect: Life-Draining.description:
The flourishing plant life that covers your body is a part of you, but it draws nutrients from your blood, making you weaker the more the flowers grow. As the plants grow, you need to spend more and more time recuperating. Recuperating in the sunshine lowers this duration, as it feeds the flowers, speeding your recovery.

Mild Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} as the plants feed off your life force. This condition lasts until you spend 3 consecutive actions to rest and do nothing.

Moderate Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until you spend 20 minutes recuperating by resting and doing nothing. If you spend this time basking in sunshine, it instead takes 10 minutes.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} until you spend 2 hours napping. While napping, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} and can't take actions or engage in exploration activities, but a creature can wake you with a single action with the manipulate trait. If you spend this time napping in natural sunlight, it instead takes 1 hour. You're fatigued until you can get a full night's rest.

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: Efekt: Life-Giving Magic
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Living Fortification.name: Efekt: Living Fortification
Effect: Living Fortification.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.name: Efekt: Living Fortification (Parry Trait)
Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Living for the Applause.name: Efekt: Living for the Applause
Effect: Living for the Applause.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Lock On.name: Efekt: Lock On
Effect: Lock On.description: The construct gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the designated enemy until the end of the turn. If you use 2 actions for the Command, the bonus is instead a +3 circumstance bonus, or a +4 circumstance bonus if you're legendary in Crafting.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).name: Efekt: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.name: Efekt: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Efekt: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Efekt While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-rank spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-rank spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Specjalne A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**

Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Efekt: Maiden's Mending
Effect: Maiden's Mending.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: Efekt: Marshal's Aura
Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Zapewniany przez being inside a Marshal's Aura.

Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Efekt: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is –3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of –5, and –6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of –10.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Efekt: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.

3.label: Vs. attacks from hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

7.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

8.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

9.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

10.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

11.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

12.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Efekt: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1k8 precision damage.

At 19. level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2k8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1k8 precision damage.

3.label: Second attack on hunted prey this round

5.label: Third attack on hunted prey this round

Effect: Mental Balm.name: Efekt: Mental Balm
Effect: Mental Balm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pEFcWRYiWLSjxvkW]{Mental Balm}

You or one ally within 30 feet gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects for 1 minute.

Effect: Metallic Skin.name: Efekt: Metallic Skin
Effect: Metallic Skin.description: You fortify your natural resistances with elemental metal, covering your skin with thick metal. You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and resistance 10 to physical damage (except adamantine), but you take a –10-foot penalty to Speed. If you take fire damage while this ability is active, until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage with all your unarmed melee Strikes.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).name: Efekt: Methodical Debilitations (Cover)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Methodical Debilitations}

The target doesn't gain a circumstance bonus to AC from Raising a Shield, lesser cover, or standard cover; it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC only from greater cover or Taking Cover.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.name: Efekt: Methodical Debilitations (Flanking)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.description: The target is unable to flank or provide flanking.

Effect: Monarch Wings.name: Efekt: Monarch Wings
Effect: Monarch Wings.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IzNyByUBNH94MDOr]{Fey Ascension}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Efekt: Monster Hunter
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Monster Warden.name: Efekt: Monster Warden
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.name: Efekt: Mountain Endemic Herbs
Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.name: Efekt: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hit)
Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.description: Marks a target that critically hit you.

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: Efekt: Mountain Stronghold
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Efekt: Mutate Weapon
Effect: Mutate Weapon.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.

Effect: Nanite Surge.name: Efekt: Nanite Surge
Effect: Nanite Surge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

Your circuitry glows, lighting a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] with dim light for 1 round.

Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).name: Efekt: Nanite Surge (Bonus)
Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering skill check.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Nymph Blood Magic
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.5Wxjghw7lHuCxjZz]{Bloodline: Nymph}

Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, either granting you a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round or imposing a –1 status penalty on one target's Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).name: Efekt: Nymph Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, imposing a –1 status bonus to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Offensive Boost.name: Efekt: Offensive Boost
Effect: Offensive Boost.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.F8oXHnu9iNTcpXbJ]{Offensive Boost}

Your improvements make any Strikes that rely on your innovation deal an additional 1k6 damage, with a type determined by the boost you choose. If your innovation is armor, the boost applies to your melee Strikes with one weapon you choose during daily preparations; if your innovation is a construct, the boost applies to your construct companion's Strikes.

Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.name: Efekt: Ongoing Selfishness
Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRMW0EiuOO20pzG2]{Ongoing Selfishness}

You gain resistance to all further damage from the triggering enemy until the end of the turn on which you used the reaction. This resistance is equal to half your Selfish Shield resistance.

Effect: Orchard's Endurance.name: Efekt: Orchard's Endurance
Effect: Orchard's Endurance.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.

Effect: Overdrive.name: Efekt: Overdrive
Effect: Overdrive.description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overdrive (Success).name: Efekt: Overdrive (Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Success).description: Your gizmos go into overdrive, adding power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overdrive Ally.name: Efekt: Overdrive Ally
Effect: Overdrive Ally.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NBvhmNqneeok7ZOr]{Overdrive Ally}

Until the end of their next turn, that ally's Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier, or your full Intelligence modifier if you were in critical overdrive.

Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.name: Efekt: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive)
Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U0XX0Mm2MbZcuNK2]{Shared Overdrive}

The first time you use Overdrive Ally during a given Overdrive, the effect lasts for the remainder of the duration of your Overdrive, instead of just until the end of the target's next turn.

Effect: Overextending Feint.name: Efekt: Overextending Feint
Effect: Overextending Feint.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9CaaU5szcf3mtJXD]{Overextending Feint}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against the opponent.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Efekt: Overwatch Field
Effect: Overwatch Field.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

Effect: Panache.name: Efekt: Panache
Effect: Panache.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}

While you have panache, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speeds and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to Tumble Through or to take any actions that give you panache due to your style.

Effect: Perfect Resistance.name: Efekt: Perfect Resistance
Effect: Perfect Resistance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]{Perfect Resistance}

After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.

Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Phoenix Blood Magic
Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.TWR1wbPJuCLnGdFZ]{Bloodline: Phoenix}

Choose to have either you or a target of the spell gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank for 1 round.

Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.name: Efekt: Pistolero's Challenge
Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yOyMlFGAgLfRas8m]{Pistolero's Challenge}

Both you and the opponent gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with Strikes made against each other. If you're a master in the skill you used for the check, the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +3, and if you're legendary, it increases to +4.

Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.name: Efekt: Plains Endemic Herbs
Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Efekt: Poison Weapon
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Portents of the Haruspex.name: Efekt: Portents of the Haruspex
Effect: Portents of the Haruspex.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tz0gvfTwcDq0yEfg]{Portents of the Haruspex}

Roll 1k12 to determine the damage type. The next time before the end of your next turn that you or your allies deals that damage type to an enemy, that enemy has weakness equal to your level against that damage.

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Efekt: Prayer-Touched Weapon
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2qR4QAgJVArv63Z2]{Prayer-Touched Weapon}

The chosen weapon deals an extra 1k6 vitality damage.

Effect: Precious Arrow.name: Efekt: Precious Arrow
Effect: Precious Arrow.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MlxfNv98LZKfYl64]{Precious Arrow}

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14. level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.

Effect: Precise Debilitations.name: Efekt: Precise Debilitations
Effect: Precise Debilitations.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wvJBIzgS298ZRp6w]{Precise Debilitations}

The target takes an additional 2k6 precision damage from your attacks.

Effect: Premonition of Clarity.name: Efekt: Premonition of Clarity
Effect: Premonition of Clarity.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2h8a6pKhXTXwpJjP]{Premonition of Clarity}

Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Efekt: Prevailing Position
Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Primal Aegis.name: Efekt: Primal Aegis
Effect: Primal Aegis.description: You gain resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, vitality, and void damage.

Effect: Propulsive Leap.name: Efekt: Propulsive Leap
Effect: Propulsive Leap.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: Efekt: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Efekt While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Specjalne A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: Efekt: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Efekt While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Specjalne A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: Efekt: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Efekt While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Specjalne A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: Efekt: Protective Spirit Mask
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.

Granted By:@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}

Effect: Proud Mentor.name: Efekt: Proud Mentor
Effect: Proud Mentor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Psi Strikes.name: Efekt: Psi Strikes
Effect: Psi Strikes.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uisI6b7Ua5zSHDwj]{Psi Strikes}

The attack deals an extra 1k6 force damage.

Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: Efekt: Psychic Rapport
Effect: Psychic Rapport.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]{Psychic Rapport}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Efekt: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PpzH9tJULk5ksX9w]{Bloodline: Psychopomp}

The border between life and death becomes blurred to you. You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: Efekt: Purifying Breeze
Effect: Purifying Breeze.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: Efekt: Push Back the Dead!
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BtZJJClWCpc31Ven]{Push Back the Dead!}

The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead. It also gains resistance to damage from Strikes made by undead creatures.

Effect: Rage.name: Efekt: Rage
Effect: Rage.description:
Wymagania You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a –1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoint based on level and con mod
  • Enables rage property for rage damage
  • Sets token effect

Effect: Raise Menhir.name: Efekt: Raise Menhir
Effect: Raise Menhir.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BuVIM4cV7qhVZ2WF]{Raise Menhir}

Choose arcane, divine, or occult; all creatures within 15 feet of the monument gain a +2 status bonus to their saving throws against effects with that trait.

Effect: Raise Symbol.name: Efekt: Raise Symbol
Effect: Raise Symbol.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.koER7gKf6CnW5O0s]{Raise Symbol}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn. While it's raised, if you roll a success at a saving throw against a vitality or void effect, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Rallying Charge.name: Efekt: Rallying Charge
Effect: Rallying Charge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.df4cBV3qZn3qNUmP]{Rallying Charge}

You gain temporary hit points equal to the Charisma modifier of the creature that used Rallying Charge.

Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Efekt: Rampaging Form
Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2k8 piercing + 1k4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1k4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Efekt: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2k8 piercing + 1k4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1k4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[cold]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Efekt: Read Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: Efekt: Reanimator Dedication
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead}.

Effect: Rebirth In Living Stone.name: Efekt: Rebirth In Living Stone
Effect: Rebirth In Living Stone.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mNiJvsbyxdLBnTRs]{Rebirth In Living Stone}

Rock overflows from within you to consume your form before cracking open to reveal your body transformed into living stone. You gain 40 temporary Hit Points. You're immune to critical hits and precision damage. You can't be pushed, pulled, or tripped while you're standing on earth or stone. Your earth Elemental Blasts deal an additional 1k10 damage of their normal type. These benefits last until the end of your next turn, but you can Sustain them up to 1 minute. After you gain temporary Hit Points from this impulse, you can't do so again for 10 minutes.

Level (20.) You gain 50 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Recall Under Pressure.name: Efekt: Recall Under Pressure
Effect: Recall Under Pressure.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws for the remainder of the combat encounter as your morale soars or a +2 status bonus if the card you drew was from the suit of Books.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).name: Efekt: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EWeso1zDkCLGlnsW]{Reckless Abandon (Barbarian)}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, a –2 penalty to AC, and a –1 penalty to saves. These bonuses and penalties last until your Rage ends or until you are above half Hit Points, whichever comes first.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Efekt: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description: For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Efekt: Reflexive Shield
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield} when you raise a shield that gives a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Renewed Vigor.name: Efekt: Renewed Vigor
Effect: Renewed Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier.

Effect: Replenishment of War.name: Efekt: Replenishment of War
Effect: Replenishment of War.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Efekt: Resounding Bravery
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's ability.

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).name: Efekt: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear)
Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's fear effect.

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Resounding Finale.name: Efekt: Resounding Finale
Effect: Resounding Finale.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lhSqWHXK1JShUabF]{Resounding Finale}

All allies that had been benefiting from the spell's effects gain sonic resistance against the triggering damage.

Effect: Restorative Strike.name: Efekt: Restorative Strike
Effect: Restorative Strike.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xUlRLkWnfZ7reej6]{Restorative Strike}

Cast a 1-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell to heal yourself, expending the spell normally. It loses the manipulate trait when cast this way. Then make a melee Strike. If you make this Strike with your deity's favored weapon, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll.

If the Strike hits, you can target a second willing creature to heal the same amount from the spell. This creature can be outside of the spell's range, provided it's adjacent to the enemy you hit.

Effect: Root Magic.name: Efekt: Magia Znachorska
Effect: Root Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.22P7IFyhrF7Fbw8B]{Magię Znachorską}

Kiedy dany sojusznik pierwszy raz tego dnia wykona rzut obronny przeciw zaklęciu lub straszydłu, zyskuje on premię sytuacyjną +1 do rzutu. Premia ta zwieksza się do +2 jeśli jesteś ekspertem w Okultyzmie lub do +3 jeśli jesteś legendarny.

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Efekt: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Efekt While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Specjalne A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: Efekt: Safeguard Soul
Effect: Safeguard Soul.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.

Effect: Sanctify Armament.name: Efekt: Sanctify Armament
Effect: Sanctify Armament.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}

The weapon gains your holy or unholy trait. It also deals an additional 2k6 spirit damage to creatures of the opposed trait.

Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Efekt: Saoc Astrology
Effect: Saoc Astrology.description: This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Efekt: Scout's Warning
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Efekt: Sea Glass Guardians
Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

Effect: Seedpod.name: Efekt: Seedpod
Effect: Seedpod.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWGa6cFSVrASTEfd]{Seedpod}

On a critical hit, a seedpod bursts, issuing forth a tangle of vegetation that imposes a –10-foot circumstance penalty on the target's Speed for 1 round.

Effect: Selfish Shield.name: Efekt: Selfish Shield
Effect: Selfish Shield.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield}

You gain resistance against the triggering damage equal to 2 + half your level, regardless of damage type.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Shadow Blood Magic
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.uoQOm41BVdSo6pAS]{Bloodline: Shadow}

Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, either granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth or imposing a –1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).name: Efekt: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth)
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth for 1 round.

Effect: Share Rage.name: Efekt: Share Rage
Effect: Share Rage.description:
You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a –1 penalty to AC.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Efekt: Shared Avoidance
Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}

Allies within 20 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Efekt: Shared Clarity
Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}

Allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Shed Tail.name: Efekt: Shed Tail
Effect: Shed Tail.description: You take a –2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.

Effect: Shield Ally.name: Efekt: Shield Ally
Effect: Shield Ally.description: The hardness of your equipped shield increases by 2.

Effect: Shield of Faith.name: Efekt: Shield of Faith
Effect: Shield of Faith.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.w3qyriA1YnzXaas3]{Shield of Faith}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your AC.

Effect: Shielding Wave.name: Efekt: Shielding Wave
Effect: Shielding Wave.description: You gain resistance to acid or fire damage.

Effect: Shining Arms.name: Efekt: Shining Arms
Effect: Shining Arms.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iAziUKdxgy4k4ypY]{Shining Arms}

When a creature wielding the weapon critically hits a foe, you can Dismiss the spell as a reaction, causing the foe to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round

Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Efekt: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Efekt While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Specjalne A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Smite Evil.name: Efekt: Smite Evil
Effect: Smite Evil.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite Evil}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes with the weapon your blade ally inhabits against that foe deal an extra 4 spirit damage if the target is unholy, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the foe attacks one of your allies, the duration extends to the end of that foe's next turn. If the foe continues to attack your allies each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Effect: Smite Good.name: Efekt: Smite Good
Effect: Smite Good.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.T5xFirAE8VLL5Lbu]{Smite Good}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 spirit damage if the target is holy, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: Efekt: Sniping Duo Dedication
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.

Effect: Soaring Flight.name: Efekt: Soaring Flight
Effect: Soaring Flight.description: To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below. You grow a pair of magical wings or expand your existing ones. For 5 minutes, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Spark Fist.name: Efekt: Spark Fist
Effect: Spark Fist.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BL2nLeClO30QoQGs]{Spark Fist}

Your fist loses the nonlethal trait and deals additional fire damage on a successful Strike.

Effect: Spell Parry.name: Efekt: Spell Parry
Effect: Spell Parry.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.X9AkydrMdFwg7qIn]{Spell Parry}

You raise your guard, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells that target you.

Effect: Spell Protection Array.name: Efekt: Spell Protection Array
Effect: Spell Protection Array.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3CPKbiweBRzXAJA9]{Spell Protection Array}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic.

Effect: Spin Tale.name: Efekt: Spin Tale
Effect: Spin Tale.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.

2.label: Target is villain of Folklorist's Spun Tale

Effect: Spiral Sworn.name: Efekt: Spiral Sworn
Effect: Spiral Sworn.description: For 3 rounds, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the rank of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

Effect: Spirit Guide Form.name: Efekt: Spirit Guide Form
Effect: Spirit Guide Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WKRSBu7H9miAwUaR]{Spirit Guide Form}

You fuse with your spirit guide, becoming a hybrid being with enhanced physical and spiritual power. This effect lasts 1 minute; you can end it early as a free action. During this time, you can't use any other actions granted by this archetype. You gain the following statistics and abilities, regardless of your type of spirit guide.

  • You become incorporeal.
  • You gain resistance 10 to all damage (except force, ghost touch, or vitality; double resistance vs. non-magical).
  • Darkvision.
  • An unarmed melee attack of the same type as your spirit guide (either claws or jaws), which is the only attack you can Strike with. You're trained with this attack. Your attack modifier is +29 or your normal unarmed attack modifier, whichever is higher. You use the listed statistics for the unarmed attack type:
    • Claws (agile, backstabber, finesse) 1, Damage 3k6+5 slashing plus 1k6 force;
    • Jaws (forceful) 1, Damage 3k10+5 piercing plus 1k6 force.

Effect: Starlight Armor.name: Efekt: Starlight Armor
Effect: Starlight Armor.description:
The armor grants you resistance 7 to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage. The armor also sheds bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

When you reach 17. level, the resistance increases to 10.

Effect: Stone Body.name: Efekt: Stone Body
Effect: Stone Body.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgg9eNF6MsJPMjyH]{Stone Body}

You gain resistance 10 to all damage.

Effect: Stoney Deflection.name: Efekt: Stoney Deflection
Effect: Stoney Deflection.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped

Effect: Strain Mind.name: Efekt: Strain Mind
Effect: Strain Mind.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u8YnTCS2EGoJl90W]{Strain Mind}

You add an amp that costs 1 Focus Point to the spell. Instead of paying the normal Focus Point cost, you lose Hit Points equal to four times the spell rank of the amped psi cantrip as you bleed from your nose or suffer some other visible sign of strain.

Effect: Strained Metabolism.name: Efekt: Strained Metabolism
Effect: Strained Metabolism.description:
Your body's overclocked physiology requires larger-than-usual amounts of nourishment, leaving you weakened when it kicks in mid-combat.

Mild Backlash Your metabolism immediately burns through your body's energy stores, making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until you take a bite of food (which usually requires 2 Interact actions: one to retrieve the food and another to consume it).

Moderate Backlash Ravenous hunger wracks your body. You are enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until you can eat a full meal, which requires at least 10 minutes.

Severe Backlash The strain on your body is truly incapacitating. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} as nausea wracks you, and you are also enfeebled 1 and clumsy 1 until you can eat a full meal (which requires you to no longer be sickened). You are fatigued until you can get a full night's rest.

0.label: Striking Retribution (vs. alghollthu and their servants) if alghollthu enchants ally

Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.name: Efekt: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes
Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.description: You gain darkvision and low-light vision, and you gain a +1 status bonus to visual Perception checks.

Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.name: Efekt: Tactical Debilitations (No Flanking)
Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.description: The target can't flank or contribute to allies' flanking.

Effect: Tail Toxin.name: Efekt: Tail Toxin
Effect: Tail Toxin.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ev8OHpBO3xq3Zt08]{Tail Toxin}

You apply your tail's venom to a piercing or slashing weapon. If your next Strike with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, you deal persistent poison damage equal to your level to the target.

Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.name: Efekt: Thoughtform Summoning
Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pqVG9mRKcXg5Rsjc]{Thoughtform Summoning}

Whenever you summon a creature, you can choose to instead create a psychic construct of that creature. This grants it resistance to physical damage equal to half its level and weakness 5 to force and mental damage.

Effect: Tidal Shield.name: Efekt: Tidal Shield
Effect: Tidal Shield.description: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. You can Sustain the effect to a maximum duration of 5 rounds.

Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: Efekt: Tiller's Drive
Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Effect: Topple Giants.name: Efekt: Topple Giants
Effect: Topple Giants.description: When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.

Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.name: Efekt: Treat Wounds Immunity
Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Opatrywanie Ran} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Treat Wounds for the duration.

Effect: Twin Parry.name: Efekt: Twin Parry
Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: Efekt: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Undead Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Undead Blood Magic
Effect: Undead Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.7WBZ2kkhZ7JorWu2]{Bloodline: Undead}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank for 1 round.

Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.name: Efekt: Underground Endemic Herbs
Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Effect: Undying Conviction.name: Efekt: Undying Conviction
Effect: Undying Conviction.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Undying Conviction}

Undead creatures gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist vitality damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them controlled.

Effect: Undying Ferocity.name: Efekt: Undying Ferocity
Effect: Undying Ferocity.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZOycr00XDVTKuXa]{Undying Ferocity}

When you use Orc Ferocity, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Unleash Psyche.name: Efekt: Unleash Psyche
Effect: Unleash Psyche.description: When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's rank. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.

Effect: Unwavering Resilience.name: Efekt: Unwavering Resilience
Effect: Unwavering Resilience.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Point equal to your level.

Effect: Ursine Avenger Form.name: Efekt: Ursine Avenger Form
Effect: Ursine Avenger Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zV4vzcl7eoVewz5p]{Ursine Avenger Form}

You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1k8 piercing damage and a claws unarmed attack that deals 1k6 slashing damage and has the agile trait.

Effect: Vicious Debilitations.name: Efekt: Vicious Debilitations
Effect: Vicious Debilitations.description: The target gains weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Effect: Victorious Vigor.name: Efekt: Victorious Vigor
Effect: Victorious Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Vigorous Anthem.name: Efekt: Vigorous Anthem
Effect: Vigorous Anthem.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4SKech3n0F38HrR5]{Vigorous Anthem}

You gain temporary HP equal to 3 + the source's Charisma modifier.

Effect: Volatile Grease (Failure).name: Efekt: Volatile Grease (Failure)
Effect: Volatile Grease (Failure).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vKFg7HMNu4cCDD8b]{Volatile Grease}

The target gains weakness 2 to fire for 1 minute.

Heightened (+2) The weakness increases by 1.

Effect: Volatile Grease (Success).name: Efekt: Volatile Grease (Success)
Effect: Volatile Grease (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vKFg7HMNu4cCDD8b]{Volatile Grease}

The target gains weakness 2 to fire until the end of your next turn.

Heightened (+2) The weakness increases by 1.

Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.name: Efekt: Walking the Cardinal Paths
Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.GpT5RXUwhINODqkJ]{(Affinity Ablaze) Arms of Balance: Walking the Cardinal Paths}

One of your weapons or your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2k6 fire, cold, acid, or electricity damage. The Strikes gain the appropriate energy trait as well.

Effect: Watch Your Back.name: Efekt: Watch Your Back
Effect: Watch Your Back.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZCyJhsaugHB6mZW]{Watch Your Back}
