The target gains a +2 status bonus to Perception checks against you, but it takes a –2 status penalty to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: Watchful Gaze.name: Efekt: Watchful Gaze
Effect: Watchful Gaze.description: You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

Effect: Weapon Infusion.name: Efekt: Weapon Infusion
Effect: Weapon Infusion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gvx8Mdg5mxUtTD5g]{Weapon Infusion}.

If your next action is an Elemental Blast, choose a weapon shape for it to take. You can choose to change the blast's damage type to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing-whichever suits the weapon shape-and you can choose other alterations depending on whether you make a melee or ranged blast.

  • Melee Add one of the following traits of your choice: agile, backswing, forceful, reach, sweep.
  • Ranged Choose one of three options: range increment 100 feet and the volley 30 feet trait, range increment 50 feet and the propulsive trait, or range increment 20 feet and the thrown trait.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.name: Efekt: Majstrowano Przy Broni (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Majstrowanie}

Ktoś majstrował przy twojej broni! Ponosisz karę sytuacyjną –2 do rzutów ataku i rzutów obrażeń tą bronią. Efekt trwa, dopóki nie użyjesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interakcji} do usunięcia go.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).name: Efekt: Majstrowano Przy Broni (Sukces)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Majstrowanie}

Ktoś majstrował przy twojej broni! Ponosisz karę sytuacyjną –2 do rzutów ataku i rzutów obrażeń tą bronią. Efekt kończy się na początku następnej tury wynalazcy, lub kiedy użyjesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interakcji} do usunięcia go.

Effect: Wings of Air.name: Efekt: Wings of Air
Effect: Wings of Air.description: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Wish for Luck.name: Efekt: Wish for Luck
Effect: Wish for Luck.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.N6U02s9qJKQIvmQd]{Wish for Luck}

Roll the attack roll, saving throw, or skill check twice and take the higher result.

Effect: Witch's Charge.name: Efekt: Witch's Charge
Effect: Witch's Charge.description: Granted when you designate someone as your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.52QyoGaysrfBOy5H]{Witch's Charge}.

Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.name: Efekt: Wood Impulse Junction
Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.description: You gain temporary hit points equal to your level.

Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Efekt: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Efekt While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you help your less experienced colleagues recognize danger and withstand danger. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to Perception checks and Initiative rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Perception modifier by 1.

Specjalne A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Worm Form.name: Efekt: Worm Form
Effect: Worm Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jynhIXH1zEavQA7v]{Worm Form}

You take on the form of a purple worm or transform into a humanoid-worm hybrid, retaining your own head but with a worm's body, transforming into a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the ability is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the form.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Purple Worm Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet
    • Melee 1 jaws (deadly 2k10, reach 15 feet), Damage 3k10+15 piercing
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, poison, reach 15 feet), Damage 2k12+15 piercing plus 2k6 persistent poison
    • Melee 1 body (reach 15 feet) Damage 1k10+13 bludgeoning
  • Hybrid Speed 40 feet
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, poison, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k12+15 piercing plus 1k6 persistent poison
    • Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet), Damage 1k10+13 bludgeoning
    • Hybrid Caster You retain the ability to speak, and can cast spells as long as they don't have somatic or material components.

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.dKTb959aCQIzSIXj]{Bloodline: Wyrmblessed}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round, or a target takes a –1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.name: Efekt: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Penalty - Target)
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.description: Draconic might carries in your voice. A target takes a –1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: You're an Embarrassment.name: Efekt: You're an Embarrassment
Effect: You're an Embarrassment.description: You reroll the triggering Will saving throw with a +1 circumstance bonus.

Stance: Air Shroud.name: Postawa: Air Shroud
Stance: Air Shroud.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QV4NCyZQBCABykS1]{Air Shroud}

Turbulent air suffuses your kinetic aura. This doesn't displace other matter but provides air for creatures in your kinetic aura that need air to breathe. Attacks with ranged weapons take a –1 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls if their paths pass through your kinetic aura. Air in your kinetic aura is difficult terrain for flying creatures other than yourself.

Stance: Arcane Cascade.name: Postawa: Tajemna Kaskada
Stance: Arcane Cascade.description:
Wymagania Twoją poprzednią akcją w tej turze było @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Rzucenie Zaklęcia} lub zadanie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{Czarociosu}. Musisz spełniać ten warunek jedynie aby przybrać postawę, nie aby w niej pozostawać.

Przekierowujesz porcję magicznej mocy zaklęcia i utrzymujesz ją krążącą w twoim ciele i broni za pomocą specjalnych postaw, kontroli oddechu i pracy nóg. Kiedy jesteś w tej postawie twoje ciosy zadają dodatkowy 1 punkt obrażeń od mocy. Te obrażenia zwiększają się do 2 jeśli masz specjalizację w broni i do 3 jeśli masz większą specjalizację w broni. Jakikolwiek cios który odnosi korzyści z tych dodatkowych obrażeń zyskuje cechę "Magia Tajemna" co czyni go magicznym.

Jeśli twoje ostatnio użyte przez wejściem w postawę zaklęcie mogło zadawać obrażenia, obrażenia zadawane przez postawę są zamiast tego takiego samego typu, co obrażenia zadawane przez zaklęcie (lub jednego wybranego przez ciebie typu spośród kilku, które mogło zadawać zaklęcie).

Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle.name: Postawa: Assume Earth's Mantle
Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vV0nW9OIJ0VdeVjy]{Assume Earth's Mantle}

Enormous pieces of rock cluster around your body. You can Dismiss this impulse.

  • You become Large if you were smaller. This increases your reach by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny).
  • You gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed, but you can use it only to climb surfaces of earthen matter.
  • The armor grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude saves and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DCs against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} you, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} you, or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
  • If your Strength is below +4, this armor raises your Strength to +4. If your Strength is +4 or higher, this armor grants you a +1 item bonus to your Strength.
  • If you have the Armor in Earth impulse, you can add its effects to Assume Earth's Mantle.

Stance: Buckler Dance.name: Postawa: Buckler Dance
Stance: Buckler Dance.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tDWc2LQNl0Op1Auq]{Buckler Dance}

Wymagania You are wielding a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{Buckler}.

You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack. While you are in this stance, you constantly have your buckler raised as if you'd used @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}, as long as you meet that action's requirements.

Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.name: Postawa: Bullet Dancer Stance
Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}

Wymagania You're unarmored and wielding a simple firearm, bayonet, or reinforced stock

Efekt You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of simple firearms. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using bayonets, reinforced stocks, and simple firearms. You can use Flurry of Blows with these weapons. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with bayonets and reinforced stocks, so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike. You can also use them with simple firearms when attacking within half the first range increment.

Stance: Claw Stance.name: Stance: Claw Stance
Stance: Claw Stance.description: You extend the claws in your hands and focus your attention to take down single targets. The only Strikes you can make are frenzied claw unarmed attacks. These deal 1k6 slashing damage, are in the brawling group, and have the agile, finesse, grapple, unarmed, and versatile piercing traits.

Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.name: Postawa: Clinging Shadows Stance
Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance}

You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1k4 void damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in the clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, and to the DC for creatures to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from you.

Stance: Cobra Stance.name: Postawa: Cobra Stance
Stance: Cobra Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1k4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly k10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).name: Postawa: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)
Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1k4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly k10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Stance: Crane Stance.name: Postawa: Crane Stance
Stance: Crane Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{Crane Stance}

You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane's wings and using flowing, defensive motions. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, but the only Strikes you can make are crane wing attacks. These deal 1k6 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Crane Stance, reduce the DC for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Skok Wzwyż} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Skok w Dal} by 5, and when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Skok}, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.

2.text: Reduce the DC for High Jump and Long Jump by 5, and when you Leap, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.

Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury.name: Postawa: Crowned in Tempest's Fury
Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8iHpUB0bYaHh86Kk]{Crowned in Tempest's Fury}

You become one with a devastating thunderstorm from the Plane of Air, placing a crown of lightning upon your brow. Sparks flash in your eyes, and lightning strikes constantly in the air around you as howling winds lift you from the ground.

  • Any creature that enters your kinetic aura or ends its turn there takes @Damage[2d12[electricity]] damage.
  • If you don't have a fly Speed, you gain a 20-foot fly Speed. If you have the Cyclonic Ascent impulse, you instead gain that fly Speed and the extra benefits.
  • You gain a +10-foot status bonus to all your Speeds.
  • Your air Elemental Blasts deal an additional @Damage[1d12[electricity]] damage.

Stance: Desert Wind.name: Postawa: Desert Wind
Stance: Desert Wind.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ti6rPcSBsCuyEHqy]{Desert Wind}

A vortex of sand and dust surrounds you. Each creature inside your kinetic aura (including you) is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from any creature outside your kinetic aura, and creatures outside the aura are concealed from creatures inside the aura other than you. Your air impulses carry sands that cut at great speed.

When you use a damaging air impulse that affects at least one creature in your kinetic aura, that impulse deals 1 additional slashing damage, or 2 if the impulse has a single target.

Level (+2) The extra damage increases by 1, or 2 if the impulse has a single target.

Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance.name: Postawa: Devrin's Cunning Stance
Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance.description: Your aura grants you and your allies a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you or an ally in the aura Strike an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.

Stance: Disarming Stance.name: Postawa: Disarming Stance
Stance: Disarming Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1p5ErCp33nGOzEsk]{Disarming Stance}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you.

Stance: Disruptive Stance.name: Postawa: Disruptive Stance
Stance: Disruptive Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OEGhbRgW6wRbccns]{Disruptive Stance}

The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you're prepared to foil enemies' actions.

As long as you are in this stance, you can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Cios Reaktywny} when a creature within your reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to manipulate and move actions.

Furthermore, you disrupt a triggering concentrate or manipulate action if your Strike hits (not only if it's a critical hit).

Stance: Dragon Stance.name: Postawa: Dragon Stance
Stance: Dragon Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8sy3sHwOHS4ImwvJ]{Dragon Stance}

You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon's tail. You can make dragon tail attacks that deal 1k10 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the backswing, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Dragon Stance, you can ignore the first square of difficult terrain while Striding.

Stance: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Postawa: Dread Marshal Stance
Stance: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon the you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Stance: Drifting Pollen.name: Postawa: Drifting Pollen
Stance: Drifting Pollen.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7W5oubPLcxHJdcHX]{Drifting Pollen}

A haze of pollen floats around you. A creature in your kinetic aura when you enter the stance, or who later enters the aura or ends its turn in the aura, attempts at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)] save against your class DC. On a failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until it's no longer sickened. A creature attempts this save no more than once per round and doesn't attempt a new save if already affected.

Stance: Everstand Stance.name: Postawa: Everstand Stance
Stance: Everstand Stance.description: When in this stance, you wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Blok Tarczą} reaction.

Stance: Fane's Fourberie.name: Postawa: Fane's Fourberie
Stance: Fane's Fourberie.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.80CEAB05TP5ki9iW]{Fane's Fourberie}

Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

When you enter this stance, choose whether to treat playing cards in your possession as daggers or darts; you can wield a playing card in all ways as the chosen weapon until the stance ends. As long as the majority of the deck remains in your possession, any cards that are lost or thrown can be found after 1 minute. Otherwise, the remaining cards are likely lost or destroyed.

A character who has this feat can enchant a single deck of playing cards as a magic weapon, etching fundamental and property runes directly onto the deck of cards.

Stance: Geologic Attunement.name: Postawa: Geologic Attunement
Stance: Geologic Attunement.description:
You gain tremorsense (imprecise) in your kinetic aura.

At 13. level this becomes precise tremorsense.

Stance: Ghosts in the Storm.name: Postawa: Ghosts in the Storm
Stance: Ghosts in the Storm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ABL4daQ7c65d0tEM]{Ghosts in the Storm}

Clouds, like eager pets, are drawn to you and to those in your good graces. Fast-moving gray clouds surround you, as well as your allies while they're in your kinetic aura. Anyone surrounded by these clouds gains a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks. When an affected creature uses a move action, clouds dance around it. Until the start of its next turn, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and its Strikes gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock} rune.

Stance: Gorilla Stance.name: Postawa: Gorilla Stance
Stance: Gorilla Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance}

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Wspinaczka}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

2.text: If you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).name: Postawa: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)
Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nRjyyDulHnP5OewA]{Gorilla Pound}, which grants you a climb speed of 15 while you are in this stance.

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Wspinaczka}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

2.text: If you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

Stance: Graceful Poise.name: Postawa: Graceful Poise
Stance: Graceful Poise.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rFaUJtB46scuAidY]{Graceful Poise}

With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion's stinger.

While you are in this stance, if you make your second Strike from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice} with an agile weapon, Double Slice counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Stance: Impassable Wall Stance.name: Postawa: Impassable Wall Stance
Stance: Impassable Wall Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YeyOqNFKaeuOTiJr]{Impassable Wall Stance}

You refuse to let foes past your guard. As long as you are in this stance, when you critically hit with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Cios Reaktywny} triggered by a move action, you disrupt that move action.

Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Postawa: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Stance: Ironblood Stance.name: Postawa: Ironblood Stance
Stance: Ironblood Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.x9cYkB8DrUBBwqJd]{Ironblood Stance}

You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow. You can make iron sweep unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, parry, sweep, and unarmed traits.

While in Ironblood Stance, you gain resistance 2 to all damage. The resistance increases to 3 at 12. level, to 4 at 16. level, and to 5 at 20. level.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.fRlvmul3LbLo2xvR]{Efekt: Parry}

Stance: Jellyfish Stance.name: Postawa: Jellyfish Stance
Stance: Jellyfish Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Jwq5o13uZF3ooln1]{Jellyfish Stance}

Wymagania You are unarmored.

You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity. You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1k6 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in Jellyfish Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Przeciskanie Się}.

Stance: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Postawa: Kindle Inner Flames
Stance: Kindle Inner Flames.description:
As a candle can light another, you awaken the latent potential to channel fire in other creatures. You shed faint, glowing embers, as do your allies while they're in your kinetic aura. Anyone shedding these embers gains a +1 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks and can Step as a free action once per round. When an affected creature takes a move action, its Strikes deal an extra @Damage[2[fire]] damage until the end of its turn.

Level (12.) The status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks is +2, and the Strikes gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming} rune instead of the extra 2 fire damage.

Stance: Lunging Stance.name: Postawa: Lunging Stance
Stance: Lunging Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZghzLmYgeE19GqjP]{Lunging Stance}

While you are in this stance, you can use Reactive Strike against a creature that is outside your reach but within the reach you would have with a Lunge. If you do, you increase your range with the Strike by 5 feet.

Stance: Magnetic Field.name: Postawa: Magnetic Field
Stance: Magnetic Field.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YJCAiNpFbX2MIc0G]{Magnetic Field}

A magnetic field surrounds you. Choose a polarity when you take this action. You can switch the polarity as a free action at the start of each of your turns while you remain in this stance.

Attract A creature that is wearing metal armor, has the metal trait, or is made of metal treats squares in your kinetic aura as difficult terrain when moving away from you. You pull unattended metal objects of light Bulk or less in your kinetic aura to you. They gather in your space and move with you.

Repel A creature that is wearing metal armor, has the metal trait, or is made of metal treats squares in your kinetic aura as difficult terrain when moving closer to you. You push unattended metal objects of light Bulk or less in your kinetic aura away. They stop moving once they're outside your aura.

Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance.name: Postawa: Masquerade of Seasons Stance
Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KMVXUgFArcftg1jQ]{Masquerade of Seasons Stance}

Choose one of the following traits: water, fire, void, or cold. You gain resistance to damage dealt by effects with the chosen trait.

Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.name: Postawa: Mobile Shot Stance
Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rByA8NDI6ZtNgBeT]{Mobile Shot Stance}

Your shots become nimble and deadly. While you're in this stance, your ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions that are triggered by a ranged attack.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Cios Reaktywny}, you can use it with a loaded ranged weapon you're wielding. The triggering creature must be within 5 feet of you for you to do so.

Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.name: Postawa: Monastic Archer Stance
Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}

You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using longbows, shortbows, or bows with the monk trait.

You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} with these bows. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with these bows when attacking within half the first range increment (normally 50 feet for a longbow and 30 feet for a shortbow), so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike.

Stance: Mountain Stance.name: Postawa: Mountain Stance
Stance: Mountain Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance}

You enter the stance of an implacable mountain — a technique first discovered by dwarven monks — allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche. The only Strikes you can make are falling stone unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the forceful, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Mountain Stance, you gain a +4 item bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped. However, you have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +0, meaning you don't add your Dexterity to your AC, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet. The item bonus to AC from Mountain Stance is cumulative with armor potency runes on your explorer's clothing, mage armor, and bracers of armor.

Stance: Multishot Stance.name: Postawa: Multishot Stance
Stance: Multishot Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzhnxgiAopWILCvs]{Multishot Stance}.

While you are in this stance, your penalty for Double Shot is reduced to –1, or –2 if you add the extra action to make three Strikes. If you move from your position, this stance ends.

Stance: Orchard's Endurance.name: Postawa: Orchard's Endurance
Stance: Orchard's Endurance.description:
Patches of bark appear on the skin of you and your nearby allies. You and your allies in your kinetic aura gain resistance 5 to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you and your affected allies roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.

Level (+4) The resistance increases by 2.

Stance: Paragon's Guard.name: Postawa: Paragon's Guard
Stance: Paragon's Guard.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hPDerDCYmag3s0dP]{Paragon's Guard}.

Wymagania You are wielding a shield

Once you've had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

While you are in this stance, you constantly have your shield raised as if you'd used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as long as you meet that action's requirements.

Stance: Peafowl Stance.name: Postawa: Peafowl Stance
Stance: Peafowl Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{Peafowl Stance}

You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can Step as a free action as your next action.

Stance: Point Blank Stance.name: Postawa: Point Blank Stance
Stance: Point Blank Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{Point-Blank Shot}.

When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.

Stance: Powder Punch Stance.name: Postawa: Powder Punch Stance
Stance: Powder Punch Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Ziky4XVV7syXVbUg]{Powder Punch Stance}

You infuse your handwraps with black powder. On your first melee Strike each round with an unarmed attack, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.dgXjUcaoQDAY6ZpO]{Knuckle Duster}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8eGV6fXbmt2v74uB]{Black Powder Knuckle Dusters}, you deal an additional 1 fire Damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.

Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.name: Postawa: Rain of Embers Stance
Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}

You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames. The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1k4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Rain of Embers Stance, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).

Stance: Ravel Of Thorns.name: Postawa: Ravel Of Thorns
Stance: Ravel Of Thorns.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mHvkBdBN4gs6CH1g]{Ravel Of Thorns}

Thorny vines grow in geometric patterns on surfaces in your kinetic aura. A creature that starts its turn in the thorns takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area. The thorns are hazardous terrain. A creature takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level –4)/4)+2)[piercing]] damage each time it moves into one of these squares. If any square the thorns grow on is water or soil, double the hazardous terrain damage for all thorns. If you move, the thorns disappear; new thorns grow at the end of your turn.

Level (+4) The damage increases by 1.

Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance.name: Postawa: Reflective Ripple Stance
Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance.description:
You can make flowing wave attacks that deal 1k6 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the agile, disarm, finesse, nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits.

While in Reflective Ripple Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed and Tripped.

Stance: Ricochet Stance.name: Postawa: Ricochet Stance
Stance: Ricochet Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tRHjUCl0xqG97nok]{Ricochet Stance (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RsNvCSrCN7czHC0G]{Ricochet Stance (Rogue)}

You adopt a stance designed to rebound your thrown weapons back toward you. While you are in this stance, any thrown weapons you use as part of a ranged Strike to deal bludgeoning or slashing damage immediately return to your hand, enabling you to use them for additional Strikes.

You must be within the weapon's listed range increment and have a hand free to catch the weapon. If you make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon outside of its listed range increment, it instead flies back toward you a number of feet equal to its listed range increment and then falls to the ground.

Stance: Rough Terrain Stance.name: Postawa: Rough Terrain Stance
Stance: Rough Terrain Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.O0POcPD2aELYTcIK]{Rough Terrain Stance}

Wymagania You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn.

You enter a stance that makes it difficult to move around you. Each square adjacent to you becomes difficult terrain that matches the terrain attunement you gained (rime forms in an arctic terrain, momentary undergrowth shoots up in a forest terrain, and so on). You ignore this difficult terrain.

This stance ends if you move into a different type of terrain.

Stance: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Postawa: Sea Glass Guardians
Stance: Sea Glass Guardians.description:
Eerily beautiful elemental water beings race around you, eager to protect and heal you and your allies. Their forms vary and might include eels formed of undulating water or ice crystals whirling in the shape of a jellyfish. The guardians flow around combatants and don't occupy a space. They attempt to intercept all dangers, granting you and your allies within your kinetic aura a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

If any creature affected is critically hit or critically fails at a saving throw against an attack, effect from an enemy, or hazard and remains above 0 HP, the guardians reach out to heal that creature. The creature regains 4k8+8 HP, and the impulse ends. If the creature is in water, the healing dice are k10s instead of k8s.

Level (+3) The healing increases by 1k8+4.

[[/r ((floor((max(12,@actor.level)-12)/3)+4)d8+(floor((max(12,@actor.level)-12)/3)*4+8))[healing]]]{Leveled HP}

Stance: Shattershields.name: Postawa: Shattershields
Stance: Shattershields.description: Four plates of pitted metal float around you to intercept attacks. You and allies in your kinetic aura gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.name: Postawa: Shooting Stars Stance
Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6cQSPqXoAO6oJl0i]{Shooting Stars Stance}

You enter a stance that lets you throw shuriken with lightning speed.

While in this stance, you can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with shuriken instead.

Stance: Six Pillars Stance.name: Postawa: Six Pillars Stance
Stance: Six Pillars Stance.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hT0pVPqFuiEsmRb8]{Six Pillars Stance}

Wymagania You are unarmored.

You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed. While in this stance, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by using actions with the concentrate or manipulate traits. In addition, when you cast a spell that requires one or more actions while in this stance, your unarmed Strikes gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage.

Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.name: Postawa: Sky and Heaven Stance
Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UjEeHamC2C8JfgJz]{Sky and Heaven Stance}

Your jagged blows are like lightning. The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1k10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits. While in Sky and Heaven Stance, you gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12. level and to 8 at 18. level.

Stance: Steam Knight.name: Postawa: Steam Knight
Stance: Steam Knight.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7PjBANpMMoBxTYq3]{Steam Knight}

You shape your kinetic aura into swirling armor of steam that scalds your enemies and propels you on super-heated jet streams. A creature can take damage from Steam Knight only once per round. Your steam armor has the following effects.

  • You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.
  • When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Skok}, you can jump up to your Speed. You don't immediately fall at the end of a jump, provided you Leap again with your next action. If you Leap over a creature and come within 10 feet, that creature takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level –6)/5)+2)d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC.
  • At the start of each of your turns, you can emit steam as a free action. It deals @Damage[(floor((@actor.level –6)/5)+2)d6[fire]] damage to each creature in your kinetic aura with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. A creature that fails is also pushed 5 feet.

    Level (+5) The fire damage from a jump or blast of steam increases by 1k6.

Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.name: Postawa: Stoked Flame Stance
Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.description:
Wymagania You're unarmored.

You enter a stance of fast, fiery movements. You can make flashing spark attacks that deal 1k8 slashing damage. They are in the brawling group and have the forceful, nonlethal, sweep, and unarmed traits. If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes 1k6 persistent fire damage.

While in Stoked Flame Stance, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. If you have incredible movement, increase the benefit from incredible movement to a +15-foot status bonus plus 5 feet for every 4 levels beyond 3..

Specjalne This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.

0.text: If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,fire]] damage.

Stance: Stonestrike Stance.name: Postawa: Stonestrike Stance
Stance: Stonestrike Stance.description: You enter the stance of unyielding stone and draw upon the power of the living rock, encasing your fists in stone and allowing you to make stonestrike attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage, are in the brawling group, and have the forceful, magical, and unarmed traits.

Stance: Stumbling Stance.name: Postawa: Stumbling Stance
Stance: Stumbling Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{Stumbling Stance}

You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated — bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements. While in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Finta}.

The only Strikes you can make are stumbling swing unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits. If an enemy hits you with a melee Strike while in this stance, it becomes off-guard against the next stumbling swing Strike you make against it before the end of your next turn.

Stance: Talon Stance.name: Stance: Talon Stance
Stance: Talon Stance.description: You sway in a loose stance that lets you sweep in wide arcs with the claws on your feet. The only Strikes you can make are spinning talon unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 slashing damage, are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, sweep, and unarmed traits. You don't need a free hand to use spinning talon strikes.

Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.name: Postawa: Tangled Forest Stance
Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2tUdsoPEnW9yS8so]{Tangled Forest Stance}

You extend your arms like gnarled branches to interfere with your foes' movements. You can make lashing branch unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you're in Tangled Forest Stance and can act, every enemy in your reach that tries to move away from you must succeed at a Reflex save, Acrobatics check, or Athletics check against your class DC or be immobilized for that action. If you prefer, you can allow the enemy to move.

Stance: Tenacious Stance.name: Postawa: Tenacious Stance
Stance: Tenacious Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5HZ4cYDowUw2oUbZ]{Tenacious Stance}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) and a +2 circumstance bonus to DCs against being Shoved and Tripped. However, you no longer negate your armor check penalty or Speed penalty for having a high Strength while in this stance.

Stance: Thermal Nimbus.name: Postawa: Thermal Nimbus
Stance: Thermal Nimbus.description: Choose cold or fire. You and allies in your kinetic aura gain resistance equal to your level to damage of that type.

Stance: Tiger Stance.name: Postawa: Tiger Stance
Stance: Tiger Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VCjAlOvjNvFJOsG5]{Tiger Stance}

You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks. These deal 1k8 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

On a critical success with your tiger claws, if you deal damage, the target takes @Damage[1d4[bleed]].

As long as your Speed is at least 20 feet while in Tiger Stance, you can Step 10 feet.

Stance: Twinned Defense.name: Postawa: Twinned Defense
Stance: Twinned Defense.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xjLbabfyQzBNT4y1]{Twinned Defense (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.kTRGAST9J9ZxJZ4A]{Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)}

Wymagania You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} action.

Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance.name: Postawa: Vitality-Manipulation Stance
Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance.description:
You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points like your rival Shino Hakusa. You gain a vitality blast ranged unarmed Strike that deals @Damage[1d4[void]] damage, has a range of 30 feet, and has the unarmed and versatile vitality traits.

Additionally, when you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.

Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.name: Postawa: Whirling Blade Stance
Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IaiEZaA8erufMUCr]{Whirling Blade Stance}

You enter a mindful stance that creates a deep connection between you and your monk weapons, allowing you to manipulate them with your ki even at a distance.

All melee Monk weapons you wield with the finesse trait gain the thrown 10 feet trait (unless they already have the thrown trait with a greater range).

Once you've made a thrown Strike with such a weapon, you can use the precision of your throw to make additional Strikes with it, even from a distance. Start from the space of the previous Strike's target to determine the range increment and whether the new target has cover. At the end of your turn, the thrown weapon flies directly back to you in a straight line. If a solid barrier blocks its path, it falls to the ground after hitting the barrier.

Stance: Whirlwind Stance.name: Postawa: Whirlwind Stance
Stance: Whirlwind Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wZZyasfIqwiJBQAQ]{Whirlwind Stance}

Wymagania You are wielding your staff, which must have the parry trait.

You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC as long as you remain in this stance.

Stance: Wild Winds Stance.name: Postawa: Wild Winds Stance
Stance: Wild Winds Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SkarN4VlNxSJSJNw]{Wild Winds Stance}

You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance.

You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1k6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

3.text: Wind crash strikes ignore concealment and all cover

Stance: Winter Sleet.name: Postawa: Winter Sleet
Stance: Winter Sleet.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xn6EaAbQlAB5ZGe6]{Winter Sleet}

Bone-chilling, swirling sleet surrounds you, cruel as deepest winter. Surfaces in your kinetic aura are coated in slippery ice. A creature that moves on the ice immediately falls unless it succeeds at an Acrobatics check or Reflex save against your impulse DC – 2. A creature that Steps or Crawls doesn't have to attempt a check or save. You're immune to this effect.

If a creature on the ice is critically hit by one of your water impulses or critically fails at a save against one, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.

Stance: Wolf Stance.name: Postawa: Wolf Stance
Stance: Wolf Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AN9jY1JVcU20Qdw6]{Wolf Stance}

You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth. You can make wolf jaw unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 piercing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

If you're flanking a target while in Wolf Stance, your wolf jaw unarmed attacks also gain the trip trait.
